alluring and charming, this fragrance is inspired by the sparkling girl. the Viva la Juicy girl finds priceless elegance in the everyday. Name: La Perla Divina
Description: La Perla Divina is a fruity, feminine fragrance that is perfect for either all-day or evening wear. Top notes of mandarin orange, pear, strawberry, and champagne blend seamlessly together to create a fruity accord with a zesty edge. Comprised of rose, African orange flower, and jasmine, the heart of the perfume anchors it in sweet floral. The aroma is rounded out with a combination of amber, musk, vanilla, and woody notes. This blend adds a subtle balsamic accord with hints of gourmand creaminess and earthiness. This flirty fragrance first hit the market it 2011.

Name: Maqam Base of Soul EDP - 120 ml

It takes only one encounter to fall in love with this oriental fragrance & reside in your memories forever! It has been composed as a sensual aroma, taking you on a profound journey into the world of Eastern notes. You will wander between saffron & rose elegance, settling on a soulful base combined by musk & sandalwood.
About the brand:
A brand designed to capture the essence of Arabian literature & honor the beauty of its written poems. Each fragrance from Maqam has been designed with famous Golden verses, to carry both exotic blends & inspiring words. These timeless fragrances are not easy to resist nor to be forgotten. Maqam was created by the founders of Sarib® - An Arabian perfume house, to capture the magic behind Arabian words & aromatic components, added into creatively crafted bottles to present its luxurious scents perfectly.
Get to know Sarib®:
"A Story Behind Every Perfume" Introducing Arabian aromatic drops with a unique approach that combines modern heritage and western inspiration. Each has its own identity with the finest ingredients & aromatic notes.
*Approved by the Saudi Food & Drug Authority

Its green crocodile logo refers to the nickname of René Lacoste, who was nicknamed "the Crocodile" by his fans, because of his tenacity on the tennis court. The company is committed to designing products that combine discovery, excellence, and style. It sells parfumes, clothing, leather goods, towels, footwear, sportswear, eyewear, and watches.

Name: Burberry London
Description:
A magical fragrance that reflects an elegant and exciting nature, thanks to the fresh notes of fresh Clementine oil mixed with rose extract enriched with the sweetness of honey blossom, to give you a feeling of vitality and elegance. Burberry London was created in 2006 by Dominique Ropion. His advertising campaign was used by actress Rachel Weiss and actor Ian Grover.
About the brand:
Founded in 1856, Burberry is a trusted luxury design house, world famous for its accessories, tartan patterns, and sturdy trench coats . Their famous motifs are often copied and imitated across the globe; however, none can match the quality of this staple of British fashion. Their fragrances match many qualities of their apparel: classic, long-lasting, and elegant.

Name: Candy Addict Addictive Temptation Mini Hair Mists Set - 3x30 ml
Description:
Candy Addict hair mists are now available in “minis” to take with you wherever you go! They contain Vitamin E, a powerful antioxidant that moisturises, smoothes & adds shine to the hair! Can't decide on your favorite scent? No problem! The Addictive Temptation set includes:
Musky Musk:
Beautiful, earthy notes of musk are layered with bergamot and rose to create a hair mist sensation! The combination of warm and floral notes makes a sensual, intoxicating hair mist!
V Vanille:
An intoxicating blend of vanilla and floral notes with a touch of Oriental! Take your fragrance game to a whole new level with this one of a kind hair sensation.
Rosy Rose:
This seductive, addictive hair mist will keep you coming back for more! The gentle, sophisticated fragrance will delicately scent your hair with floral notes of rose and geranium and musk. Pure heaven.
How to use:
From about 20 cm away, spritz the mist evenly over your hair. Then, go and enjoy your deliciously beautiful hair! Don't forget to shake the bottle before use to liven up the candy!
Reapply throughout the day whenever you need a dose of awesomeness!
About the brand:
Candy Addict is here to break the rules of perfume and bring you fresh, quirky, unforgettable scents that will keep heads turning all day long! Candy Addict was born out of a love for all things fragrance. We use these fabulous fragrances to bring you an incredible range of hair & body mists, perfumes, home fragrances & a wonderful bath & body selections!
Details: ['Candy Addict', 'Women', 'Perfume Set,Hair Mist', '2021']

Name: Penhaligon's Halfet
Description:
Halfeti by Penhaligon's is a woody-floral fragrance exclusively designed for women by famous perfumer Christian Provenzano. The perfume leads you through the garden of citruses, spices, and herbs while blending the notes of grapefruit and bergamot with cardamom, saffron, artemisia, and cypress needles. The middle note is developed on a flowery base of Bulgarian rose and jasmine, which is accentuated with shades of nutmeg. Finally, you can also feel the warmth of the base note that blends cedar, oud, leather, amber, sandalwood, musk, vanilla, and Tonka uniquely.
About the brand:
Penhaligon's is the British perfume brand, which was found by William Henry Penhaligon in 1870. The brand is perhaps one of the few in the world that maintains its commitment to traditional ingredients and techniques in creative combinations. Made in the UK, the perfume brand offers a wide selection of fragrance for both women and men who wish to smell good at all times. Most perfume bottles feature a clear glass decorated with a ribbon, which was the original design envisaged by William Penhaligon.

“Warm, deep and rich"
A fragrant blend with endless creativity! Rich in its luxurious oriental Oud, deep thanks to its amber and musky notes, and warm with its woody notes, cashmere, and guaiac. This distinctive aromatic fragrance will not leave your side, as it lasts for long hours, and brings out a harmonious & beautiful Oud scent.
About the brand:
Discover this collection of charming & velvety oriental perfumes "The Finest". A luxurious set characterized by its elegance & charm, introducing the most endearing Arabic notes in its essence. “The Finest” offers a new take on Oriental fragrances, revealing its uniqueness through its main 3 fragrances: Oud, Rose & Amber.

Name: Yves Saint Laurent Libre Intense
Description:
An aromatic masterpiece crafted for women seeking freedom and uniqueness. Its fragrance contains a blend of scents inspired by exotic flowers, added to the seduction of citrus and the elegance of woody notes. All this magic is presented to you in a mythical bottle of precious drops and a charming scent that attracts attention to you.
About the brand:
Yves Saint Laurent is a French luxury fashion house that's considered one of the most outstanding fashion houses in the world. It was founded by its owner, the international designer Yves Saint Laurent and his friend Bergé in 1961. The company offers a wide range of products. It is known for its modern and creative pieces of ready-to-wear items for women and men, as well as accessories, leather products, and watches. The brand's first fragrance was launched in 1981. Since then, it has gained its unique position in the world of perfumes.

Name: Givenchy Eau De Moiselle
Description:
Create a vintage vibe around your outfit by wearing Eau Demoiselle perfume from Givenchy. This fragrance is wholly on its own. It is not quite modern but not quite traditional. It exists on its own terms with a composition that consists of notes of Italian winter lemon, tangerine, ylang-ylang, rose, Japanese basil, tonka, ambrette seed, and musk. Eau Demoiselle offers the sensation of walking through a garden on a dewy morning. Its composition was developed by the expert perfumer, Francois Demachy. This perfume is available in a gorgeous, cylindrical flacon.
About the brand:
Founded in 1952, Givenchy is a beloved French luxury fashion house and perfume maker that continues to leave an indelible mark on the fashion industry. Today, the brand is celebrated worldwide for its avant-garde and timeless haute couture clothing, accessories, perfumes and cosmetics.

Van Cleef & Arpels Moonlight Patchouli eau de parfume is a great unisex fragrance that was introduced in 2016. The scent starts with spicy patchouli, creamy wood and cocoa. Then dark woody mixes of floral and leather notes are blended together.

Van Cleef & Arpels is one of the leading brands in the world of jewelry, watches and parfumes, which was founded in 1896 by Salmon Arpels and Alfred Van Cleef. They opened their first store in Paris in 1906.

For the rebel soul in you. This fragrance is the most evoking scent from this collection. It started with a quest to find a true adventurous fragrance. This scent emerged to fulfill this pursuit, by blending the earthly scent of oud wood, the strength of tobacco, the refreshing coffee accord & the complexity of vetiver. A timeless combination, only a true braveheart can own it.
About the brand:
Mastering the art of fragrance, “Very Important Notes” is a unique collection designed by the Arabian perfume house SARIB®. Each fragrance unveils the most majestic notes from around the world, blended with Noble Arabian scents. Description:
The new Jean Paul Gaultier perfume for her. So couture. So Scandal! How scandalous! How does she dare? So outrageous. So Couture. The new Eau de Parfum So Scandal! wittily reveals an even more daring and sensual Jean Paul Gaultier brand of femininity. In the chic but crazy world of Paris high society, her amused casualness is so stylish it gets her noticed wherever she goes. And so Her floral trail is so addictive, it loves to be talked about.
About the brand:
Jean Paul Gaultier is a French fashion designer whose first collection was presented in 1976. The first perfume of the Gaultier house was launched in 1993, and now has 125 perfumes in his fragrance base.

Name: Givenchy Hot Couture
Description:
Hot Couture was introduced in 2000. This women’s fragrance is chic, sexy and oh, so French. Top notes are bright, succulent and fruity. Raspberry and mandarin are the ideal counterpoints to bergamot for an irresistibly charming scent. Heart notes are warm and layered. The spicy heat offered by pepper is balanced by the lushness of magnolia and vetiver’s dry woody scent. Hints of bitter chocolate weave through the base of sandalwood, amber, and musk. The perfume projects well, even during the colder months. This perfume is created for unusual woman, provocative and irresistibly charming.
About the brand:
Founded in 1952, Givenchy is a beloved French luxury fashion house and perfume maker that continues to leave an indelible mark on the fashion industry. Today, the brand is celebrated worldwide for its avant-garde and timeless haute couture clothing, accessories, perfumes and cosmetics.

Name: Maqam Al Shoyoukh EDP - 120 ml
Description:
The word "Sheikh" has a deep and long history in the Oriental world, and for a long time, this word has always been reflected with luxury and pride. We offer you this perfume to take you on a captivating journey to Europe with Moroccan jasmine and rose. After, you will feel the fragrance of authentic amber with notes of musk and aged Virginia cedarwood that will create mountains of solidity and strength inside your soul. You will also experience the scent of red apple along with the sweetness of caramel for a sprinkle of deliciousness. This perfume is specially made to make you feel the oriental luxury that surrounds us with its endless splendor.
About the brand:
A brand designed to capture the essence of Arabian literature & honor the beauty of its written poems. Each fragrance from Maqam has been designed with famous Golden verses, to carry both exotic blends & inspiring words. These timeless fragrances are not easy to resist nor to be forgotten. Maqam was created by the founders of Sarib® - An Arabian perfume house, to capture the magic behind Arabian words & aromatic components, added into creatively crafted bottles to present its luxurious scents perfectly.
Get to know Sarib®:
"A Story Behind Every Perfume" Introducing Arabian aromatic drops with a unique approach that combines modern heritage and western inspiration. Each has its own identity with the finest ingredients & aromatic notes.
*Approved by the Saudi Food & Drug Authority

Name: Lacoste Eau De Lacoste
Description:
The design of this feminine rich fragrance is inspired by the shape of the tennis ball to show universality and simplicity, which represent Lacoste's ideologies. The blend of pineapple, bergamot and vanilla will provide you with a soft feeling of freshness to show your femininity.
About the brand:
Lacoste is a French company, established in 1933 by tennis players René Lacoste and André Gillier. Its green crocodile logo refers to the nickname of René Lacoste, who was nicknamed "the Crocodile" by his fans, because of his tenacity on the tennis court. The company is committed to designing products that combine discovery, excellence, and style. It sells parfumes, clothing, leather goods, towels, footwear, sportswear, eyewear, and watches.

Name: Burberry Body Tender
Description:
A youthful feminine fragrance that gives you a feeling of vitality and elegance thanks to its harmonious blend of flowers and fruits, such as fresh English roses, with white jasmine and sandalwood, added to them lemon, fresh apple, and green absinthe, in addition to ambergris and musk.
About the brand:
Founded in 1856, Burberry is a trusted luxury design house, world famous for its accessories, tartan patterns, and sturdy trench coats . Their famous motifs are often copied and imitated across the globe; however, none can match the quality of this staple of British fashion. Their fragrances match many qualities of their apparel: classic, long-lasting, and elegant.

Name: Candy Addict Colourful Moments Hair Mist Set - 3x30 ml
Description:
Candy Addict hair mists are now available in “minis” to take with you wherever you go! They contain Vitamin E, a powerful antioxidant and Provitamin B5 that moisturises, smoothes & adds shine to the hair! Can't decide on your favourite scent? No problem! The Colourful Moments set includes:
Purple Rain:
Falling from afar from a magical world full of flowers and purple roses, dreamy and delicate, touching your hair and returning again with its abundant aroma and musky notes that will last for a long time.
Pink Moon:
As soon as it's there, it controls the vibes, and when it appears, it announces a new beginning in which flowers bloom to spread their oriental fragrance in your hair. A long-lasting fragrance for your hair with a wonderful and harmonious blend of raspberry, caramel and leather.
Blue Light:
Its fragrance radiates everywhere and anytime without stopping, captivating you with its beauty, so you follow its long-lasting fragrance among fruit trees, which flow in your hair with great softness.
Moisturize, soften and strengthen your hair with Vitamin E, a powerful antioxidant, and Provitamin B5. Give your hair that extra shine and volume that it deserves, whilst leaving your hair less prone to breakage.
How to use:
From about 20 cm away, spritz the mist evenly over your hair.
Then go out and be awesome!
Don't forget to shake the bottle before use to liven up the candy!
Reapply throughout the day whenever you need a dose of fabulousness!
About the brand:
Candy Addict is here to break the rules of perfume and bring you fresh, quirky, unforgettable scents that will keep heads turning all day long! Candy Addict was born out of a love for all things fragrance. We use these fabulous fragrances to bring you an incredible range of hair & body mists, perfumes, home fragrances & a wonderful bath & body selections!
Details: ['Candy Addict', 'Women', 'Perfume Set,Hair Mist', '2021', '3 * 30 ml']

Name: Burberry Brit Rhythm Floral
Description:
Burberry introduced the fragrant pair inspired by the British rock scene; Brit Rhythm for Him was launched first in September 2013., followed by the feminine edition Brit Rhythm for Her in 2014. In February 2015, new flankers of the fragrances are coming out - Brit Rhythm for Him Intense and Brit Rhythm for Her Floral. Brit Rhythm Floral for Her is a sensual floral composition enriched with citrus fruit. It opens with fresh accords of lemon from Sicily and orange. The heart notes are floral tones of Egyptian jasmine, lotus, and lilac. Woods, amber, and musk end the composition.
About the brand:
Burberry Group PLC is a British luxury fashion brand, headquartered in London, England. It is founded in 1856 by Thomas Burberry. This fashion house is focusing on a variety of products such as outerwear, accessories, fragrances, sunglasses, and beauty cosmetics.

Name: Yves Saint Laurent Black Opium
Description: Black Opium, the new fragrance announced as a rock'n'roll interpretation of the classic that should highlight the dark, mysterious side of the YSL brand. Master perfumers Nathalie Lorson and Marie Salamagne, in collaboration with Olivier Cresp and Honorine Blanc, developed the composition. Notes of coffee, present in large quantities, dominate the scent. Additional accords are pink pepper, orange blossom, jasmine, vanilla, patchouli and cedar. Name: Coach Floral
Description:
Coach Floral is a feminine and romantic perfume that was introduced in 2018. It has a perfect blend of florals, fruits, and spices that make it perfect for any occasion, night or day. The fragrance opens with notes that will excite your senses and consist of pink peppercorn, citrus Coeur and pineapple sorbet. The heart notes are what give this perfume its name and are gardenia, rose tea and jasmine sambac. The fragrance then settles into the base notes of patchouli, musk and creamy wood. The rounded glass bottle is adorned with the emblem of the brand and a pale pink flower hangs off the neck.
About the brand:
A leading design house of modern luxury accessories and lifestyle collections, Coach has built a long-standing reputation of quality craftsmanship, defined by a free-spirited, all-American attitude. Inspired by its heritage over the past 75 years, the brand approaches design with a modern vision, reimagining luxury for today with a unique authenticity and innovation synonymous with effortless New York style.

Name: Lalique Lalique Le Parfum
Description: Lalique Le Parfum is an oriental perfume for women. It is a masterpiece with a very unique, classy, and elegant blend that matches the success, accomplishment and presence of a confident, sassy and delightful woman. The opening is sharp with zesty Bergamot, spicy Bay Leaves and intense Pink Peppercorn before Jasmine and Heliotrope take over, accentuated by Almond accents. The dry-down is a warm, cozy and elegant Patchouli note alleviated by beautiful, creamy Vanilla. Lalique Le Parfum is a pleasant winter daytime perfume that is a delightful mix of spicy and sweet.

Name: Coach Coach Women
Description:
Originally released in 2007, Coach perfume by Coach is a 2016 updated version that has a free-spirited and authentic attitude. Its fruity-floral scent is uplifting and refreshing with just a hint of the sort of elegant leather accessories that have made the designer famous. The fragrance opens with top notes of pink pepper, pear, and raspberry leaf, and then reveals a luxurious heart of Turkish rose. The base notes finish the aromas in a blend of suede musk and rich sandalwood, to give the perfume an undeniable allure. This is a classic fragrance that is always a good choice for any of your occasions.
About the brand:
A leading design house of modern luxury accessories and lifestyle collections, Coach has built a long-standing reputation of quality craftsmanship, defined by a free-spirited, all-American attitude. Inspired by its heritage over the past 75 years, the brand approaches design with a modern vision, reimagining luxury for today with a unique authenticity and innovation synonymous with effortless New York style.

Name: Guerlain Encens Mythique
Description:
The ethereal frankincense leaves only a fleeting mark on this fragrance, while the rose imprints its fiery accents. But the endless sweetness and exceptional depth come from the authentic and majestic ambergris of New Zealand, specially selected by Thierry Wasser for this fragrance.
About the brand:
Guerlain is a legendary French perfume house with 175 years of the outstanding business founded in 1828, for passion and tradition. Guerlain has always used luxurious and rare materials for their perfumes, such as French vanilla or ylang-ylang from their own plantations in the Comoro Islands. Besides that, Guerlain has been an innovator in the use of synthetic materials: Jicky (1889) was the first perfume to which Aimé Guerlain added a synthetic component, coumarin.

How to use:
Hair mist:
From about 20 cms away, spritz the mist evenly over your hair. Then smile, this is gonna be your day! Don't forget to shake the bottle before use to liven up the candy!
Body mist:
For best results, hold the bottle at least 20 cms away to ensure even coverage. Spray your body mist all over the body after showering or throughout the day to freshen up!

Description:
Thierry Wasser takes you on an imagined, sensorial voyage and crosses the exotic borders. Patchouli Ardent captures your senses with its deeply faceted woody, floral scent. The passionate artist, Thierry Wasser, has re-identified patchouli, the raw material usually dark woody, in a surprisingly vibrant and enchanted way.

This brand is one of the oldest brands in the world, characterized by traditional fragrances with the common olfactory accord, known as the "Guerlinade." Their products mainly depend on bee excretion and its numerous benefits.

Name: Estée Lauder Modern Muse
Description:
Modern Muse by Estée Lauder is inspired by the self-confident and independent woman of the modern-day. This scent makes you feel confident, independent and inspiring. It perfectly blends floral, citrus, and earthy notes in a beautiful combination. The top notes of mandarin orange will add a zesty flavor to your senses. The heart notes of Sambac jasmine, Chinese jasmine, tuberose, light honeysuckle, and fresh white lily lends a stunning appeal to it. The base notes of sensual musk, Madagascar vanilla, golden amber, and patchouli are hard to miss.
About the brand:
Estée Lauder is a leading cosmetics brand known for its wide range of skincare and beauty products. Established by Estée Lauder in 1946, this brand largely known for its lipsticks and other skincare products is also regarded for its collection of colognes and luxury perfumes. The perfumes from this brand embody passion, which makes them popular among men and women of different ages.

Name: Guerlain Santal Royal Guerlain
Description: Guerlain Santal Royal is a woody oriental fragrance for men and women alike; derives its inspiration from the East. This is a balanced oud scent that takes you on a trip to the exotic Orient. It embraces the paradox between the dark notes of leather and oud and the floral notes of rose and jasmine. The tantalizing aroma of jasmine and neroli sweeps you off your feet before it develops at the heart with cinnamon, rose and peach. The sweet scents are wrapped up in a base of sandalwood, leathery notes, musk notes and oud notes.

Scandal is a new kind of fragrance for women, the elegant aura is sullied by the Pigalle spirit beloved by Jean Paul Gaultier. At night, it’s a sensual and scandalous honey combined with patchouli: an addiction that’s just so Jean Paul Gaultier.

The name “Jean Paul Gaultier” is a celebrated luxury fashion house with many desirable fragrances to its name. Famous for its captivating range of feminine and masculine fragrances, Jean Paul Gaultier is among the top perfume manufacturers in the world.

Alexandre.J is a brand by French perfume maker and artist Alexandre.J, who introduced it in 2012. The brand is known for sculpting various men and women fragrances using high-quality ingredients. All the perfumes stand out due to exemplary craftsmanship of bottles, which are created from fine materials such as crystal, mother of pearl, leather, and wood.

Armand Basi is a Spanish fashion and lifestyle brand. In 1940 Mercedes Basi founded and opened her first store in Barcelona, Spain. She specialized in knitwear made of high-quality Scottish yarn. After that, they were able to establish a first manufacturing factory for premium knitwear garments. Armand Basi fragrances are made in collaboration with perfumers Olivier Cresp, Jean-Pierre Bethouart, Fabrice Pellegrin, Quentin Bisch, Nathalie Lorson, Francis Kurkdjian, Veronique Nyberg, Olivier Pescheux, Annick Menardo, Sylvie Fischer, Alberto Morillas, Francoise Caron and Alienor Massenet.

Name: S.T Dupont Blanc
Description: Blanc by S.T. Dupont is a joyful fragrance for unique women. This lady-like delightful sent is a celebration of a purity, innocence and new beginnings. The floral opening bursts with a mixture of white currant, white nectarine and tangerine, a gentle balance of pleasant first notes. Want to be that person that smells so good you make everyone wonder what you're wearing? The fresh, dry sweetness of Powdery Pow will make you that person! The opening notes of rose & iris lead to the clean, powdery sweet base notes and POW! Love at first spritz.
About the brand:
Candy Addict is here to break the rules of perfume and bring you fresh, quirky, unforgettable scents that will keep heads turning all day long! Candy Addict was born out of a love for all things fragrance. We use these fabulous fragrances to bring you an incredible range of hair & body mists, perfumes, home fragrances & a wonderful bath & body selections!
Life is about diversity! Feeling joyful and sweet? Marshmallow Mash is your girl. Feeling sassy? V Vanille has got you! Let's celebrate beautiful scents and the wonderful world of Candy Addict. Our magnetic creations will keep you coming back for more. Ready to meet your next obsession?

A fragrance characterized by the aroma of fruit mixed in harmony with the pure floral extract to form a captivating blend of delicacy and vitality, with a wonderful combination of grapefruit extract, jasmine extract and a soft touch of white musk for a woman full of optimism and vitality.
About the brand:

Description:
Byredo Black Saffron is an Oriental Spicy fragrance for women and men. The product is formulated with the top notes are Chinese grapefruit, juniper berries, and saffron; middle notes are black violet and leather; base notes are cashmere, vetiver, and raspberry.
About the brand:
Byredo is a European luxury brand founded in Stockholm in 2006 by Ben Gorham. The brand aims to translate memories and emotions into products and experiences. Byredo produces products using the highest quality materials available, and high-end design details to fuel a renewed approach to modern luxury.

Name: Valentino Valentina
Description: The Eau de Parfum Spray from the Valentina series of Valentino is a fresh, floral, fruity and oriental fragrance for women, presented in a gorgeous bottle. The fragrance opens with a bright citrusy note and a fragrant hint of white truffles. Tuberose emerges from the heart along with orange blossoms, with the uplifting combination of jasmine and strawberries. The distinctive base notes are deep with a mixture of cedar, vanilla and amber. A classy scent, Valentina Valentino is an ideal choice for spring and summer. It is sensual, seductive and breathtaking.

Description:
The perfumer Pierre Mancera presents Roses Vanille which hits you first with notes of fresh lemon of calabria and then sneaks on you with turkish delight and rose with the base notes of cedarwood, intense vanilla & white musk, which lingers on with you the whole day long with Sweet enough to capture you, rich enough to keep you and complex enough to seduce you fragrance.
About the brand:
Perfumer Pierre Montale started Mancera’s brand in 2008 and opened his first Mancera luxurious perfume boutique at Place Vendome in Paris. Mancera perfumes are known for being made from precious and luxurious ingredients, rare and refined materials.

Name: Tiziana Terenzi Kirke
Description:
This sweet, fruity perfume is inspired by the enchanted potions of Goddess Circe. Its scent guides you through mythic paths to explore stunning marvels. It is distinguished by a lush bouquet of sensual fruits, including raspberries and pears. The juicy scent is warmed by the indulgent, sweet heliotrope flower and a seductive base of musk.
About the brand:
Tiziana Terenzi is a family-owned Italian niche brand of fragrances, primarily scented candles and then perfumes. It was established as Cereria Terenzi in 1968 in Cattolica. Evelino Terenzi’s sons, Tiziana and Paolo, are now the owners of the brand. Tiziana Terenzi is the designer, while Paolo Terenzi is the president of the company. It has produced more than 73 perfumes. The earliest edition was created in 2012 and the newest in 2020.

Name: Guerlain Bois Mysterieux
Description:
Unique and audacious, Bois Mystérieux, a creation by Thierry Wasser, perfumer of the Guerlain Maison, is a modern interpretation of the concept of exoticism. Dark is the night, a deep night that only unveils its radiance through its intensity, adorned with touches of cedar, patchouli, and myrrh.
About the brand:
Guerlain is a legendary French perfume house with 175 years of the outstanding business founded in 1828, for passion and tradition. Guerlain has always used luxurious and rare materials for their perfumes, such as French vanilla or ylang-ylang from their own plantations in the Comoro Islands. Besides that, Guerlain has been an innovator in the use of synthetic materials: Jicky (1889) was the first perfume to which Aimé Guerlain added a synthetic component, coumarin.

About the brand:
Van Cleef & Arpels is a French luxurious jewelry, watch, and perfume company. It was founded in 1896 by Alfred Van Cleef and his father-in-law Salomon Arpels in Paris. Their pieces often feature flowers, animals, and fairies, and have been worn by style icons such as Farah Pahlavi, the Duchess of Windsor, Grace Kelly, Elizabeth Taylor and Eva Perón.

Name: Lancôme Miracle
Description: This fragrance can be exactly described by two words: energy and revelation. The beauty lies in living, in maintaining interests, in seeing and cherishing every second of life as a miracle, and in the ability to start all over again. Uma Turman is the face of Miracle – a beautiful and wonderful woman able to walk both on the air and on solid ground.

Name: The Magic of Elegance Set
Description:
This set contains:
Uniqo Tempesta EDP - 100 ml
A unique scent inspired by the magnetic force of Tempesta (Storm in Italian). This life-shifting power, chaotic yet undescribable with its' blend of marine accords, bay leaf & ambergris.

Designed for the modern woman, delicate yet intoxicating. The opening notes of fresh pink pepper & orange blossom gently give way to the softness of vanilla, to complement a youthful, vibrant character.
Mood By Minis - 3 x 30 ml
1- Amber Mood:
Feels like a new day? This fragrance is designed for new beginnings, a fresh start full of positivity and surrounded by notes of apple blossom, amber, ylang-ylang & cedarwood.
2- Leather Mood:
Feels like a successful day? If you are ready to take on the world & conquer the impossible, “Leather Mood” is there for you! This intense fragrance has the strength & power of cardamom, green matte & leather.
3- Musk Mood:
Feels like a joyful day? Sit back & relax with this cheerful scent draped in neroli sweetness, amber warmth & an aromatic musk base.
The Finest Amber EDP - 100 ml
“Sweet, Strong and Spicy"
A fragrant blend with endless creativity! Sweet notes of amber and delicious vanilla, strong thanks to its woody notes from sandalwood to patchouli, and spicy from its aromatic notes such as cardamom and nutmeg. This distinctive fragrance will not leave your side, as it lasts for long hours, and brings out a harmonious & beautiful Amber scent.

Name: Bvlgari The Roman Night
Description:
An elegant fragrance that leaves beauty and pleasure touch to enjoy your special night. This fragrance combines with peony, soft scent of jasmine and spicy notes of black pepper that mixes with black musk and vetiver
About the brand:
Bvlgari is an ancient Italian parfume house founded by Sotrios Voulgary in Italy in 1884 and has replaced the letter "U" with the letter "V" in the name of the company following the old Latin language which is the language of his native country Greece, and opened the first outlet for parfumes produced in 1905 in Via de Condotti Here he presented a collection of the most luxurious and elegant men and women parfumes, and soon became famous and opened sales outlets in the international markets in New York, Geneva and others around the world.

Name: Orto Parisi Megamare
Description:
Enjoy a refreshing and relaxing cruise for the nerves in the midst of the ocean waves, as water particles are scattered on your face and seaweed caresses your skin accompanied by warm amber drops that give you a touch of elegance and unique attractiveness. The perfume has stability and high concentration to last with you until the Last moment.

Name: Burberry Classic
Description:
A distinctive classic perfume in its simple minimalist design and elegant and elegant scent. This perfume consists of a mixture of lively extracts of filtered peach mixed with breezes of sweet and pear apricot swimming among them small black currant grains, all of this comes to you in harmony elegantly with jasmine, and accompanied by sandalwood with rice, and you will be blessed with the delicacy of musk mixed with vanilla, to you this exceptional composition The creator is from the hands of Michel Almirak in 1995.
About the brand:
Founded in 1856, Burberry is a trusted luxury design house, world famous for its accessories, tartan patterns, and sturdy trench coats . Their famous motifs are often copied and imitated across the globe; however, none can match the quality of this staple of British fashion. Their fragrances match many qualities of their apparel: classic, long-lasting, and elegant.

Top notes of Aigner Debut accentuate fresh fruity aromas of bergamot, mandarin, grapefruit, and green apple additionally cooled down with petitgrain. The heart incorporates luminous orange blossom, water lily, jasmine, and sunflower seed, on a deeply warm and cuddly base of patchouli, cedar, vanilla, white musk, and oakmoss.
About the brand:

Name: Hugo Boss Boss Orange Woman
Description:
A warm and passionate fragrance that combines exceptionally refreshing notes of crunchy apple freshness and floral notes with a scent of vanilla and sandalwood. All these notes complement each other to create a fragrance that liberates feelings and you can enjoy it with a lot of passion
About the brand:
Founded in 1925 by Hugo Boss for clothing launching purpose, Hugo Boss is a German luxury fashion house. As of 2016, Hugo Boss has 1,100 retail stores worldwide. Hugo Boss has emerged as probably one of the most famous brands in the manufacturing and selling of fashion products. With a strong emphasis on both masculine and feminine products, you simply cannot help but fall in love with their perfumes.
Details: ['Hugo Boss', 'Women', 'Perfume', 'Feminine', 'Fruity', '50 ml', '2009', 'Apple, Sandalwood, Olive Tree, Vanilla,', 'Eau de Toilette']
Ingredients: Apple, Sandalwood, Olive Tree, Vanilla,

Name: Lancôme Trésor Midnight Rose
Description: A candied rose of love, warm and juicy, sweetly addictive. When the passionate temper of an extroverted sweet rose meets the delicious addiction of mischievous raspberry and blackcurrant explosion and the sexy bite of mysterious vibrant woods. This is a pulsing Rose, a Midnight Rose.

Name: Bvlgari Eau Parfumée Au Thé Noir Intense
Description:
A romantic fragrance with rose and mangolia flowers that mix with oud to satisfied your dreams and adds a delicate and soft sense that lasts with you throughout the day and night.
About the brand:
Bvlgari is an ancient Italian parfume house founded by Sotrios Voulgary in Italy in 1884 and has replaced the letter "U" with the letter "V" in the name of the company following the old Latin language which is the language of his native country Greece, and opened the first outlet for parfumes produced in 1905 in Via de Condotti Here he presented a collection of the most luxurious and elegant men and women parfumes, and soon became famous and opened sales outlets in the international markets in New York, Geneva and others around the world.

This fresh oriental fragrance will awaken your senses, thanks to its magnificent composition, which features green mandarin, and aquatic notes of water jasmine on the top. The heart contains a blend of ginger lily and vanilla on base of sandalwood, cahsmere and ambergris notes.

Name: The Oud Set
Description:
This set includes:
The Finest Oud - 100 ml
"Warm, deep and rich"
A fragrant blend with endless creativity! Rich in its luxurious oriental Oud, deep thanks to its amber and musky notes, and warm with its woody notes, cashmere, and guaiac. This distinctive aromatic fragrance will not leave your side, as it lasts for long hours, and brings out a harmonious & beautiful Oud scent.p>
Kun Safi Oud Safi - 1.7 Tola / 20g
“Discover Oud.. Discover the Oriental charisma”
Pure Luxurious perfume oil extracted from the finest Agarwood, granting you an authentic scent of Arabian charm. This oil was designed for unique perfumes collectors, to enjoy both Oud intensity and modern design. The modern tola bottle features an advanced technique, with a twist & apply cap ensuring accurate and smooth oil applying. Every aspect of this oil was created to guarantee a mesmerizing Oud experience, waiting for you to unleash it!

Name: Givenchy Dahlia Divin
Description:
Givenchy is launching a new fragrance Dahlia Divin in September of 2014. Dahlia Divin follows the theme and the fantasy of the Dahlia Noir line that was started in 2011. Dahlia Divin's composition is centered around a Sambac jasmine note on a woody-chypre base. It was created by perfumer Francois Demachy. Mirabelle plum is at the opening, leading way to the heart of Sambac jasmine and white flowers. The base is woody, made of sandalwood, vetiver and patchouli.
About the brand:
Founded in 1952, Givenchy is a beloved French luxury fashion house and perfume maker that continues to leave an indelible mark on the fashion industry. Today, the brand is celebrated worldwide for its avant-garde and timeless haute couture clothing, accessories, perfumes and cosmetics.

Eau de Rouge is a seductive perfume with a heart of musk heart and warm bouquet of Bulgarian rose and iris mixed in with an amber-woody base that includes vetiver as well as cedar wood.
About the brand:
One of the foremost American designers during the last two decades, Narciso Rodriguez plays a singular role in global fashion. Narciso Rodriguez’s fashion house is based in NYC where he shows his women’s ready-to-wear, handbags, shoes and fragrance collections.

Name: Flower Magic Set
Description:
This set contains:
WAW Rose EDP - 50 ml
The soft, delicate fragrance combines the top note of rose continued with fine amber & completed by musk to create a timelessly elegant floral oriental perfume. Fragrance expert? Try layering "WAW Rose" perfume with other fragrances from the "WAW" collection to create your own unique, signature scent!
Uniqo Tempesta EDP - 100 ml
A unique scent inspired by the magnetic force of Tempesta (Storm in Italian). This life-shifting power, chaotic yet undescribable with its' blend of marine accords, bay leaf & ambergris.
COZY Summer Bliss Room Spray - 500 ml
If ever the title of a home fragrance corresponded exactly to the effect it creates, then this is it, Summer in a bottle! This anti-bacterial home fragrance brings with it a bundle of exciting notes, to cheer the mood instantly. This bright aromatic fragrant contains bergamot, pineapple & musk, mixing both oriental soul & summery breeze.
Mood By Minis - 3 x 30 ml
1- Amber Mood:
Feels like a new day? This fragrance is designed for new beginnings, a fresh start full of positivity and surrounded by notes of apple blossom, amber, ylang-ylang & cedarwood.
2- Leather Mood:
Feels like a successful day? If you are ready to take on the world & conquer the impossible, “Leather Mood” is there for you! This intense fragrance has the strength & power of cardamom, green matte & leather.
3- Musk Mood:
Feels like a joyful day? Sit back & relax with this cheerful scent draped in neroli sweetness, amber warmth & an aromatic musk base.

Name: Gucci Oud
Description:
This fragrance has a rich intense composition, thanks to the fresh fruity scents of raspberry, pear and saffron at the top, giving a way to the heart notes which contain Bulgarian rose and orange blossom, then comes the base notes of patchouli, amber, mixed with musk and oud. The components will provide you with enigmatic aroma that takes the scent to a new level.
About the brand:
Gucci is a renowned Italian luxury brand of fashion and leather goods. From producing and selling luxury outerwear, leather bags, cashmere scarves and cosmetics products to releasing incredible fragrance ranges every now and then, Gucci has stayed on the top of the perfume market around the world.

Name: Estée Lauder Beautiful
Description:
Beautiful Perfume by Estée Lauder is a fragrance for women who love floral scents. The top notes of mandarin orange, bergamot, lily, cassia, lemon, rose and blackcurrant will invigorate your senses with their refreshing aromas. The middle notes of ylang-ylang, marigold, jasmine, lilac, freesia, and tuberose are sure to soothe your senses. Finally, the base notes including vetiver, amber, cedar, musk, vanilla and sandalwood uplift the perfume with their sensual aromas.
About the brand:
Estée Lauder is a leading cosmetics brand known for its wide range of skincare and beauty products. Established by Estée Lauder in 1946, this brand largely known for its lipsticks and other skincare products is also regarded for its collection of colognes and luxury perfumes. The perfumes from this brand embody passion, which makes them popular among men and women of different ages.

About the brand:

The set comes to you in an elegant distinctive package designed in a different way.
You can present this set as a gift to everyone you love on different occasions.
The aromatic composition is immersed with concentrated jasmine in the beginning, heart, and end to stay with you throughout the day without fading.

Who Am I? In this modern world, I Am an essence driven by the Yes behind each & every moment! Just Yes to every blossom drenched with ylang-ylang essence. Name: Dior Joy
Description:
The many elements of Dior Joy come together to express the perfumer’s vision of light. It begins with fruity top notes of citrusy mandarin and bergamot which rest atop floral middle notes of Grasse rose and jasmine. The perfume is supported by earthy base notes of cedar, sandalwood, white musk, and patchouli. Inspired by pointillist paintings that use a pattern of distinct colors to create a complete image, this perfume’s many facets blend into a soft but vibrant scent, clear and brilliant light transformed into a perfume.
About the brand:
Founded in 1946 by designer Christian Dior, Dior is a pillar in the world of leather goods, fashion accessories, footwear, jewelry, timepieces, fragrance, makeup and skin care products, maintaining a long tradition as a creator of haute-couture fashion. In 1947, the group's first fragrance, Miss Dior, took the world by storm. Since that fateful day, Dior fragrances have truly made their mark thanks to their scope of influence and the use of the noblest of materials, boldly and passionately creating high-quality, unique and timeless fragrances.

In the heart covers Florentine iris, jasmine essence, and Bulgarian rose, which are joined in the base note by vetiver, sandalwood, and oakmoss. The icon of imperishable stylish and femininity. A parfume like an abstraction work of art.
About the brand:
Jean-Louis Scherrer was a wonderful French couturier whose elegant designs were a favorite among the wealthy and glamourous. he stopped fashion production in 2007 and Scherrer remained an active brand for licensed products, including parfumes. In 2014, the brand was refreshed. and opened a flagship shop on Rue du Faubourg Saint Honoré. Then the brand's first parfume release since the early 2000s, One Love, was launched in 2015. The first edition was in 1979 and the newest is from 2017.

From producing and selling luxury outerwear, leather bags, cashmere scarves and cosmetics products to releasing incredible fragrance range every now and then, Gucci has stayed on the top of the perfume market around the world.

La Femme Prada L’Eau reveals its inherent femininity though a golden metal bottle and delicate pink Saffiano leather, which bears the Prada heritage crest.

The company started in 1913 by Mario Prada and his brother Martino as a leather goods shop "Fratelli Prada" in Milan, Italy. After years from establishing it Miuccia Prada took over the company in 1978, and then started making Backpacks, perfumes and achieved extensive fame in Europe.

Description: Valentino Donna Rosa Verde is a fresh citrusy fragrance for women, presented in a studded glass bottle. The fragrance opens with refreshing and bright notes of bergamot and ginger blended with a hint of petitgrain. Smooth magnolia, soft green rose and exotic osmanthus explode in the floral heart. The dry-down is sexy with mate, akigalawood and musk mallow. This fragrance is formed to satisfy the needs of the spontaneous woman. It is charming as it celebrates freedom and spontaneity. The irresistible and charming scent reflects new beginnings, sweet memories and blissful moments.

It's an Eau de Parfum that sets you ready for a new adventure of beautiful scents with top notes of Osmanthus, Jasmine Sambac, the heart notes of Sandalwood, Vanilla that represents the essence of the parfume, and the base notes of Labdanum, Tolu Balsam which stays with you through out the day

Description:
Shiseido Zen is a vibrant floral scent, with wood and spices designed by Michael Almairac. It opens up with a zesty grapefruit note, sweet bergamot, orange, pineapple, wrapped in blue rose. The heart features a floral bouquet made of freesia, gardenia, violet, lily-of-the-valley, Chinese rose, red apple, and lotus blossom. The base notes are a warm and sensual blend of patchouli, cedarwood, musk and white musk, amber and frankincense. This bottle is designed by Taisuke Kikuchi.
About the brand:
In 1872, Shiseido opened its doors in Ginza, Tokyo. This business originated as Japan’s first Western-style pharmacy transformed into a global beauty giant that runs in approximately 120 countries and regions around the world. Innovative beauty products, new values, and happiness of customers across the world is their main priority.

Name: Givenchy Very Irresistible
Description:
Very Irresistible is an exhilarating perfume that combines a plethora of rose notes mixed with green and aromatic accords for a delightful and luminous scent that’s sure to draw attention your way, no matter where you go. Top notes of zesty lemon verbena, crisp cassia leaf, and exotic star anise introduce the aroma with a bright, revitalizing atmosphere. Meanwhile, heart notes of flirty pink peony, rich magnolia, and various elegant rose essences take center stage with their lavish floral bouquet. Finally, the base note of vibrant taif rose wraps the entire perfume in more luxurious, feminine sophistication for a dazzling and enticing fragrance that works perfectly as a warm-weather accessory.
About the brand:
Founded in 1952, Givenchy is a beloved French luxury fashion house and perfume maker that continues to leave an indelible mark on the fashion industry. Today, the brand is celebrated worldwide for its avant-garde and timeless haute couture clothing, accessories, perfumes and cosmetics.

Name: Givenchy Very Irresistible Electric Rose

Very Irresistible Electric Rose is a magnetic women’s fragrance by Givenchy. Top notes of tart citrus lemon, fresh green basil, breezy lemon verbena and dark, sweet blueberry start the scent with a bright and energetic tone. Heart notes of dewy violet, exotic star anise and lush red rose incorporate some Oriental flair with its luscious floral and spicy bouquet. Completing the fragrance are base notes of fresh-cut cedar and pearly white musk for a sensual, feminine perfume that’s entirely seductive, charming and alluring. Perfect for casual wear during a night out on the town.
About the brand:
Founded in 1952, Givenchy is a beloved French luxury fashion house and perfume maker that continues to leave an indelible mark on the fashion industry. Today, the brand is celebrated worldwide for its avant-garde and timeless haute couture clothing, accessories, perfumes and cosmetics.

Description: Cabotine Gold by Perfumes Gres is a limited edition perfume for women presented in a unique, elegant and colorful bottle. Name: Parfums Gres Cabotine Rose
Description: Cabotine Rose by Perfumes Gres is a wonderful floral fruity perfume for women. This soft, light and refreshing scent is suitable for summertime. The composition starts with fruity top notes. A mix of tender black currant, sweet mandarin and cherry pear dances in a background of cherry blossom. The heart is floral with a mélange of clean peony, fresh mimosa, sweet tuberose, orange blossom, exotic lily, jasmine, subtle rose and a shade of pepper. The dry-down is an elegant combination of sandalwood, musk, vetiver and frangipani. Cabotine Rose by Perfumes Gres is for a bubbly woman who likes, just like all girls, to have fun.

Name: Moschino Pink Fresh Couture
Description: The first thing shoppers are sure to notice about Moschino Pink Fresh Couture is its interestingly ironic packaging. However, this Moschino creation has much more to offer than just an original exterior. The contents contain a one-of-a-kind fragrance that’s well-liked among perfume aficionados worldwide. The top notes include black currant, pink grapefruit, and lily-of-the-valley. The core notes consist of pomegranate, pink hyacinth, and heady rose. Base notes of ambroxan, cedar and musk wrap up the experience and add a bit of smoothness to the otherwise sweet mixture. Moschino Pink Fresh Couture has a soft sillage despite the number of notes involved in the mixture and offers a very long-lasting wear time.

The brand, founded in 1978 by Margaretha and Wolfgang Ley, spread a distinct sense of refined quality, workmanship, and excellent fit and is characterized by color, print, and the love for detail. The ESCADA Group operates in 24 countries in North America, Europe, and Asia. With around 1,100 points of sale, ESCADA is present in 80 countries worldwide.

Description:
A modern feast for the senses. Served in a sleek metal and glass apple bottle, this juicy fragrance combines the scent of apple with a sophisticated blend of exotic flowers and sensual woods. Like the city that inspired it, Be Delicious celebrates individuality with refreshing spirit.
About the brand:
Donna Karan is one of the most iconic names in American fashion. Her iconic silhouettes and innovative system of dressing remain as relevant as ever, now reimagined in a modern-day Donna Karan New York and its next-generation counterpart, DKNY. Caviar and pizza. Black car and taxi. The skyline and the street. Together, Donna Karan New York and DKNY are the two sides of a city that inspires the label's essence and creed.

Description:
Hidden Fantasy by Britney Spears is a floral, fruity aroma specially crafted for women. It was launched in the year 2008. The perfume is created by perfumer Rodrigo Flores-Roux. The fragrance has accords of Sweet Oranges, Grapefruit Blossom, Tangerine, Clove, Verbena, Napolitano Cake, Stargazer Lily, Sambac Jasmine, Jacaranda Wood, Vanilla Beans, Amber, and Sandalwood.

Name: Dior Addict
Description:
Dior Addict EDP is a sensual oriental fragrance for women. Tropical mandarin leaf is tempered with soft, juicy blackberry in the top notes. White floral middle notes include orange blossom, night-blooming cereus, and jasmine, colored with a hint of rose. Base notes blend bittersweet tonka bean with milky sandalwood and sweet vanilla, creating a rich, creamy effect. There is nothing shy or subtle about this long-lasting fragrance; with its heavy sillage, it is best worn at night. Its bold floral notes bring warmth and light to chilly evenings, so it is good for the fall and even better for winter.
About the brand:
Founded in 1946 by designer Christian Dior, Dior is a pillar in the world of leather goods, fashion accessories, footwear, jewelry, timepieces, fragrance, makeup and skin care products, maintaining a long tradition as a creator of haute-couture fashion. In 1947, the group's first fragrance, Miss Dior, took the world by storm. Since that fateful day, Dior fragrances have truly made their mark thanks to their scope of influence and the use of the noblest of materials, boldly and passionately creating high-quality, unique and timeless fragrances.

Description: BRACCIALINI Purple is floral, fruity and sweet fragrance for women. It is the last finish that you need for a bright and fulfilling day. The fragrance opens with a delightful mixture of mandarin, airy black current and lush pear. The middle notes are a floral blend of Sambac jasmine, ylang-ylang, orange blossom and white flowers. The base contains oriental notes including amber wood, white musk and Tonka bean. Purple is a ravishing color that flatters charming gorgeous women, giving them a seductive aura. Wear this scent for romantic cool nights.

Description: Braccialini Pour Femme an oriental fragrance for women. The scent is strong, unique, nice and long-lasting and is developed for an ambitious chic woman who relishes fashion and style. The fragrance opens with fresh green notes of bergamot blended with bright tangerine and lush red berries. The middle notes include honey aromas mixed with white flowers and juicy peach. Description: Braccialini Casual Pour Femme a floral woody musk fragrance for stylish and aspiring women. The fragrance opens fresh, rich and crispy with a mixture of bergamot, black currant and green leaves. The heart bursts with a bouquet of lily-of-the-valley, rose, ylang-ylang and jasmine. Name: Dior Miss Dior
Description:
Miss Dior, by Dior, was created for the elegant and spirited young woman in love. Romantic by nature, Miss Dior inspires an intense and playful love. The fragrance is characterized by an instant and captivating charm. Miss Dior is a chypre that develops step by step. It glides from the sharp charm of a fresh, fruity, citrus prelude into blossoming floral notes, then on to the noble elegance of patchouli, before finally concluding with musk, the last trace of memory. With veritable riches concealed in its heart, Miss Dior develops most intensely and astonishingly.
About the brand:
Founded in 1946 by designer Christian Dior, Dior is a pillar in the world of leather goods, fashion accessories, footwear, jewelry, timepieces, fragrance, makeup and skin care products, maintaining a long tradition as a creator of haute-couture fashion. In 1947, the group's first fragrance, Miss Dior, took the world by storm. Since that fateful day, Dior fragrances have truly made their mark thanks to their scope of influence and the use of the noblest of materials, boldly and passionately creating high-quality, unique and timeless fragrances.

Luscious and bright, it instantly draws you in. Fresh jasmine and gardenia thrust a lush powder into the fragrance. Their hypnotizing aromas create a dreamy experience. Name: Dior J'Adore
Description:
The eau de parfum is the great Dior floral for women with a generous and well-balanced bouquet, and its richness is a source of inspiration. By celebrating Ylang Ylang from the Comoro This feminine fragrance is a blend of elegant florals and fresh fruits with a touch of woody and earthy notes. Its top notes include melon, peach, pear, magnolia, bergamot, and mandarin orange. Its heart consists of powerful florals with a touch of fruit and freshness. They include tuberose, orchid, lily of the valley, rose, violet, jasmine, plum, and freesia. Earthy musk, warm vanilla, aromatic cedar, and juicy blackberry form the base notes of this stunning fragrance. Sillage is moderate and longevity is high, making this the perfect perfume for a long day or evening. Wear this powerful scent for special occasions when you want to make an impression.
About the brand:
Founded in 1946 by designer Christian Dior, Dior is a pillar in the world of leather goods, fashion accessories, footwear, jewelry, timepieces, fragrance, makeup and skin care products, maintaining a long tradition as a creator of haute-couture fashion. In 1947, the group's first fragrance, Miss Dior, took the world by storm. Since that fateful day, Dior fragrances have truly made their mark thanks to their scope of influence and the use of the noblest of materials, boldly and passionately creating high-quality, unique and timeless fragrances.

An intoxicating, addictive, and luminous floral composition that makes it perfect for a woman. The top notes contain Apricot, Italian Bergamot, and Iced Basil Sorbet. Midnight Heat Eau de Parfum by Beyoncé is that perfect sensual fragrance you are searching for, a perfect synonym for passion. It embodies the excitement of hot summer nights. The top notes of the perfume contain rich, fruity flavors of plum and starfruit, Black Tulips, and Orchid. The heart notes contain Purple Peony. The base notes contain Amber, Patchouli, and Sandalwood.

Description:
Hayari Goldy symbolizes the French-style luxury and mesmerizes with its top notes of rosemary and mugwort herb; heart notes of narcissus, jasmine; and base notes of musk, cedarwood, and sandalwood. This perfume strikes a perfect balance between extravagance and refinement.

The fragrance line was introduced in 2011 by the designer to complement his famous evening gown range, popularized by several Hollywood celebrities such as Beyonce, Kylie Minogue, Nicole Kidman, and so on. All perfumes are created in collaboration with international perfumers.

Name: Givenchy Dahlia Divin Eau Initiale
Description: Givenchy Dahlia Divin Eau Initiale is a perfume made for women using white magnolia, the flower symbolizing purity and dignity. This fragrance is made for classy women using beautiful blend of fresh jasmines and rose petals. The opening notes are bergamot and blood orange. The heart notes are fresh magnolia, jasmine, rose and lotus; while the base notes are clean musk and sandalwood. Its light weight mingles with the skin so naturally, it becomes a part of it. This well-balanced and well-composed scent is pretty, feminine and warm. It speaks elegance and delicacy. For every special woman, there is Givenchy Dahlia Divin Eau Initiale.

Description:
Estée Lauder's White Linen is a women's perfume, which was introduced in 1978. This is a refreshing and light scent that makes a perfect women's wear at all times. The top notes comprise Bulgarian Rose, jasmine, and Muguet. The floral heart notes comprise violet and orris, and the base notes are vetiver, moss, and amber.
About the brand:
Estée Lauder is a leading cosmetics brand known for its wide range of skincare and beauty products. Established by Estée Lauder in 1946, this brand largely known for its lipsticks and other skincare products is also regarded for its collection of colognes and luxury perfumes. The perfumes from this brand embody passion, which makes them popular among men and women of different ages.

The opening of the perfume is a promising medley of lily of the valley, freesia with a light trace of violet. The heart of the composition is accentuated by a bouquet of red roses, giving it a romantic feeling. The flower combination goes on to include delicate, fresh and fragrant Moroccan orange flower, warm and sensuous jasmine and intoxicating ylang-ylang. The floral heart gives way to a masculine and sexy base that starts with a dose of honey, a splash of oak moss and sandalwood.

Description:
This floral fragrance shows the fresh green mandarin that combines with soft flowers and warm breeze of wood that adds beauty to your unique elegance which accompanies you in your steps.
About the brand:
Pierre Balmain is a French fashion designer known for his luxurious and elegant designs. He was born in 1914 and grew up in a family famous for its distinction in fashion and fashion. Balmain left his architectural studies and moved to the world of parfumes and then joined the famous fashion house Lucien Lilong in the 1940s and with the end of the World War The second was ready to open its own fashion house, and then began producing luxury and distinctive parfumes from this decade and spread to all the global markets

Name: DKNY Nectar Love
Description:
Dkny Nectar Love is an original fragrance for women released in 2017 by American designer Donna Karan. The perfume combines floral, fruity, and fresh accords to create a scent that is reminiscent of fresh honey. It is anchored in warm, sweet base notes of beeswax, vanilla, cedar, neroli, and musk. These are followed by fresh middle notes of Mirabelle, jasmine, and lily of the valley. Finally, its top notes consist of juicy nectarine, mandarin orange, grapefruit, and yellow freesia. All of these blend together to create a unique perfume that is sweet, playful, and youthful, but still appropriate for women of almost any age.
About the brand:
Donna Karan is one of the most iconic names in American fashion. Her iconic silhouettes and innovative system of dressing remain as relevant as ever, now reimagined in a modern-day Donna Karan New York and its next-generation counterpart, DKNY. Caviar and pizza. Black car and taxi. The skyline and the street. Together, Donna Karan New York and DKNY are the two sides of a city that inspires the label's essence and creed.

The fragrance opens with a unique fruity vibe composed of aromatic peach and invigorating mandarin blossom. The middle notes add freshness and slight sweetness with soft peony, smooth jasmine and exquisite orange blossom. The base is mellow with orris and woody notes. Description:
Aigner Starlight Gold is a renovated version of the original Starlight perfume. This fragrance includes oriental notes along with the classic floral aromas to add depth to the delicacy of the original perfume. It opens with fruity top notes of plum and bergamot before revealing the middle notes of jasmine, tuberose, ylang-ylang, and violet. These floral notes are brought back down to earth with base notes of moss, amber, vanilla, and sandalwood. Aigner Starlight Gold is a white floral, woody and powdery smell, it will amaze you every time you use it, and for sure it will inspire everyone to try it.

Known to enhance the pleasures in life and reflect a certain savoir vivre and sheer style, Aigner has become an integral part of its customers' journey. Description: AV by Adrienne Vittadini is a floral fragrance for women, presented in a sensational bottle. The opening is aromatic-floral with lovely notes of bergamot, sweet cyclamen and bewitching lily-of-the-valley. The heart is a combination of floral freesia, soft may rose, warm jasmine and lovely ylang-ylang. The base has an excellent mixture of mellow orris, rich sandalwood, woody moss, sensual musk and delightful Tonka bean. The fragrance is sensual but fresh, crisp and pleasant. Feel the ocean air wearing this sexy scent. Ideal for summertime, AV is exquisite, charming and enchanting.

Name: Cartier La Panthere
Description:
Cartier La Panthere was launched by the established Cartier brand in 2014. A feline floral fragrance born out of radiant, delicate gardenia coming together with velvety notes of musk. Within the flask, a sculpture depicts the majestic, fascinating panther. The fragrance in this set contains captivating perfume that reflects a liberated, passionate woman starting with the top note of the whimsical and intoxicating gardenia flower blended with sweet rose, earthy musk, deep patchouli, and leathery oakmoss. La Panthere is a long-lasting scent accessory and features a moderate sillage that’s sure to complement any ensemble without overwhelming others.
About the brand:
Cartier is a French luxury goods conglomerate that designs, manufactures, distributes and sells jewelry and watches. Founded by Louis-François Cartier in Paris in 1847, the company operates more than 200 stores in 125 countries and is regarded as one of the most prestigious luxury goods manufacturers in the world. Expanding into the world of fragrances, the luxury house found further success, creating perfumes and care products that continue to appeal to their international customer base.

THE ESSENCE OF JOY. There is a charming sensation of freshness from the very first notes which are carried along in a deliciously heady current of crushed Mint, with a zest of Italian Limone Primo Fiore Femminello", harvested from the first spring blossoms in Calabria. At its base, ACQUA DI GIOIA bears the signature of water rooted in the Earth, revealed by luscious LMR Cedarwood Heart sprinkled with sensuous Brown Sugar and Labdanum, which is one of the rare plants to possess animal notes. A beautiful fresh floral fragrance ideal for the warm season.
About the brand:
Girogio Armani has no competition when it comes to quality fragrances and perfumes for men and women. With an annual turnover of $1.6 billion as of 2017, Armani specializes in ready-to-wear, accessories, glasses, cosmetics, and perfumes. It is one of the most popular brands that have stopped using animal fur in their products.

Name: Cartier Baiser Fou
Description:
Baiser Vole Fou, a fragrance by Cartier, debuted in early 2017 as a member of the Baiser Vole or “Stolen Kiss” collection. Meant to evoke images of flirtatious lipstick kisses, Baiser Vou was designed with luxurious orchid as a middle note. Orchid, a fragrance reminiscent of lipstick, summons imagery of desire and beauty. This strong aroma is carried by coy base notes of white chocolate and vanilla. Raspberry lingers as a top note, giving this sweet fragrance a taste of candy kisses. This aromatic powdery fragrance is a splendid add for any woman's day.
About the brand:
Cartier is a French luxury goods conglomerate that designs, manufactures, distributes and sells jewelry and watches. Founded by Louis-François Cartier in Paris in 1847, the company operates more than 200 stores in 125 countries and is regarded as one of the most prestigious luxury goods manufacturers in the world. Expanding into the world of fragrances, the luxury house found further success, creating perfumes and care products that continue to appeal to their international customer base.

About the brand:

Their famous motifs are often copied and imitated across the globe; however, none can match the quality of this staple of British fashion. Their fragrances match many qualities of their apparel: classic, long-lasting, and elegant.

Name: Ferrari Noble Fig
Description: The Ferrari Noble Fig fragrance awakens your senses as you experience its fresh yet sensual accords. Using crisp and spicy top notes of fig leaf, mandarin and pink pepper, this cologne immediately lifts your spirits. The essence is then rounded off to softer notes of clary sage and iris, which make up the heart of this fragrance and bring forth its fresh, green impression. Finally, the finishing notes remain to reveal the warm and earthy scents of deep musk and sweet patchouli, which keep you in the virtual warmth of summer.
Details: ['Ferrari', 'Unisex', 'Perfume', 'Charismatic', 'Oriental', '100 ml', '2017', 'Fig Leaf, Pink Pepper, Mandarin Orange, Clary Sage, iris, Musk, Patchouli.', 'Eau de Toilette', 'Fig Leaf, Mandarin Orange, Pink Pepper', 'Clary Sage, Iris', 'Patchouli, Musk']

Name: Dior Poison
Description:
Poison is an iconic fragrance described as dark and mysterious. Designed by Edouard Flechier, this elegant scent was released in 1985. The deep, juicy aroma of plum acts as the main accord for this perfume partnered with the subtle sweetness of mixed berries. It then takes a floral turn, the romantic scents of carnation, jasmine, and incense making up the heart, topped off with a spicy hint of cinnamon. The perfume finishes on a warm note with a base that features amber, heliotrope, cedar, and vanilla. This fragrance is available in 3 different sizes of eau de toilette and comes in a dark-colored bottle topped with a crystal-like cap
About the brand:
Founded in 1946 by designer Christian Dior, Dior is a pillar in the world of leather goods, fashion accessories, footwear, jewelry, timepieces, fragrance, makeup and skin care products, maintaining a long tradition as a creator of haute-couture fashion. In 1947, the group's first fragrance, Miss Dior, took the world by storm. Since that fateful day, Dior fragrances have truly made their mark thanks to their scope of influence and the use of the noblest of materials, boldly and passionately creating high-quality, unique and timeless fragrances.
Details: ['Dior', 'Women', 'Perfume', 'Glamorous', 'Aromatic', '50 ml', '2011', 'Coriander Seeds, Plum, Forest Fruits, Anise, Brazilian Rosewood,Carnation, Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Tuberose, Opoponax, Incense, Rose, Honey,Vetiver, Rose, Honey', 'Eau de Toilette', 'Coriander Seeds, Plum, Forest Fruits, Anise, Brazilian Rosewood', 'Carnation, Jasmine, Orange Blossom, Tuberose, Opoponax, Incense, Rose, Honey', 'Vetiver, Rose, Honey']

About the brand:
Alexandre.J, a creative french designer launched his fragrance brand in 2012 with a single predisposition that frees him from the traditional perfumery to his perfumery vision of beauty, luxurious packing, and exceptional fragrances.

A light floral fragrance, expresing romance and love to fly and dream high as possible as you can. It is a legend of wonerful lovely scents of neroli, orange blossom, cloves, musk, and white cedar extract all together to make all our dreams come true.
About the brand:
Elie Saab is the most well-known Arab fashion designer. He started his business in the early 1980s and specialized in bridal couture. He is the first Arab to create such a name and brand in the fashion industry. He created his first perfume in 2005, which won the award for the best new perfume in England, United States, and France.

A floral woody fragrance that take you in a wonderful journey through different countries, as it strats with Gardenia, moving to he egyptian jasmine in the heart, to end with the indian sandalwood in the base.

Name: Alaïa Paris Eau De Parfum
Description:
Close your eyes and follow your instincts for Alaïa can always surprise you! Alaïa has launched a modern creation of a breath-taking fusion of both cool and warm notes. Bury your nose in the real warmth of the sophisticated fragrant aroma of Paris Eau De Parfum. This bowl of pure bliss starts with the undeniable seductive scent of airy notes at the top to feel fresh and comfortable. The heart identifies a truly unique and bespoke fragrance leaving you in a floral impression. The aroma adds its final touch with an impression of animal and musky notes, ensuring that the fragrance is the star of the show.
About the brand:
Alaïa brand is named after its Tunisian founder and designer Azzedine Alaïa. Alaïa is renowned as a sculptor of the female form that understands the female body and reflects this in his designs through unique craftsmanship. The late couturier could design a dress from sketch to stitch using luxe materials and cutting-edge skills. Alaïa brand illustrates the art and the talent of its artist by composing of Fashion & Accessories, Beauty & Fragrances, Watches & Jewelry, Wines & Spirits, and Food & Gifts. It turns out that the late Alaïa has left a precious legacy to explore.

Name: Narciso Rodriguez Santal Musc Eau De Parfum Intense
Description:
Santal Musc comes with a floral musk scent that is suitable for women with top notes of ylang-ylang and cardamom and middle notes of musk and a base of sandalwood and other woody notes.
About the brand:
One of the foremost American designers during the last two decades, Narciso Rodriguez plays a singular role in global fashion. Narciso Rodriguez’s fashion house is based in NYC where he shows his women’s ready-to-wear, handbags, shoes and fragrance collections.

Name: Lalique Terres Aromatiques Noir Premier 1905
Description: Lalique Terres Aromatiques Noir Premier 1905 is an aromatic fragrance for both men and women. It has a subtle black character that is dark, sharp and mysterious. The opening is a blast of tropical scents. The cool and spicy cardamom contrasts with bright lemon tones that are softened with sweet and juicy pineapple. Freesia blends smoothly with thyme and lavender in the heart. The dry-down is warm and lush with a mixture of Tonka, with its deep aroma, woody vetiver and the unique molecule orcanox. Lalique Terres Aromatiques Noir Premier 1905 is a very classy and versatile perfume that glows the best in winter.
Details: ['Lalique', 'Unisex', 'Perfume', 'Charismatic', 'Oriental', '100 ml', '2017', 'Cardamom, Lemon, Pineapple,Thyme, Lavandin, Freesia,Vetyver, Tonka Beans, Orcanox', 'Eau de Parfum', 'Cardamom, Lemon, Pineapple', 'Thyme, Lavandin, Freesia', 'Vetyver, Tonka Beans, Orcanox']

Name: Lalique Elegance Animale Noir Premier 1989
Description: Lalique Elegance Animale Noir Premier 1989 is a woody fragrance for both men and women. A beautiful, natural, soft and cool scent which gives you a unique and an elegant feel. The composition opens with a refreshing peachy tone and a hint of geranium. Saffron occupies the background adding an alluring air. The heart of the fragrance unfolds with rose, elegantly accompanying jasmine. The Gurjum balsam’s sweet and spicy touch gives way to the animalistic base of leather and sandalwood. This scent can be worn year around and is perfect evening and nighttime occasions.

Name: Lalique Fleur Universelle Noir Premier 1900
Description: Lalique Fleur Universelle Noir Premier 1900 is an oriental fragrance for both men and women. This attractive scent with fancy notes will give you an elegant feel. Fleur Universelle is a unisex fragrance; warm and rich, spicy but sweet. Aromal rum blends smoothly with Cardamom and Chypre in the opening. Pink Pepper adds a delicate sparkle to the resplendent notes. Immortelle, Myrrh and Cinnamon give an intoxicating impact in the heart. The base is woody with Molecule Lorexon. The bottle with its magnificent design and brilliant packaging is the cherry on top.

Name: Lalique Rose Royale Noir Premier 1938
Description: Lalique Rose Royale Noir Premier 1938 is a fruity floral fragrance for both men and women. A very classy and modern scent, Rose Royale will last and linger as it sweetly mingles with your skin. Peach and Apricot open the fragrance with a sweet welcome. The ephemeral opening fades away to be overcome by the exotic Osmanthus and Rose Absolute in the heart. Musk dominates the base with a faint trace of sweet Cashmere Wood. Lalique Rose Royale is an elegant fragrance that combines luscious fruit accords and exotic tones to produce a sensational scent.
Details: ['Lalique', 'Unisex', 'Perfume', 'Charismatic', 'Oriental', '100 ml', '2014', 'Peach, Apricot,Osmanthus, Rose, Cashmere Wood, Musk.', 'Eau de Parfum', 'Apricot, Peach', 'Rose Absolute, Osmanthus', 'Cashmere Wood, Musks']

Description: Lalique L'origine Or Intemporel Noir Premier 1888 is a spicy oriental fragrance for both men and women. It is a scent that combines tobacco and coffee producing an out-of-the-world scent. The opening of the fragrance is beautiful and spicy thanks to Cardamom mixed with Black Pepper and Bergamot. The heart bursts with an explosion of sexy Tobacco before leaning in to the dark notes of Coffee. Violet lingers in the background as the base notes take over. The Vanilla fragrance is dominant in the base along with earthy Patchouli, which is ready to burst, overflowing you with warmth.

Name: Lalique Nilang
Description: Lalique Nilang is an oriental fruity fragrance for women, presented in a gorgeous bottle with a flower stopper and crystal glass that celebrates beauty, femininity and nature. The top notes open with a miraculous scent. The Lotus Flower floats ahead of the fruity entrance. Peach and Melon give out a sweet vibe. The middle phase preserves the floral notes with Jasmine, Clove Flower, Freesia and Wild Blueberries. The balanced and sexy base consists of hints of Sandalwood and Amber with delicious Praline and pure Vanilla. This creative blend of different accords is a unique characteristic of Lalique.

Name: Elizabeth Arden 5th Avenue Royale
Description: Elizabeth Arden 5th Avenue Royale is an oriental fragrance for glorious women that gives them an elegant aura and alluring charm. Inspired by New York City nightlife, this fragrance is for an adventurous woman who engages in the glamorous social life with grace and flair. The opening of the fragrance is deep, dark and smoky with raspberry before turning into sweet and fruity with liquor notes. The heart beats with richness and seduction as patchouli warms the scent up. The leather-suede base is intensely exotic and sexy. Elizabeth Arden 5th Avenue Royale is for ladies with individuality and oomph.

Name: Amouage Sunshine
Description:
Refreshingly uplifting, Amouage Sunshine brings a bit of sunshine into any life. This oriental floral fragrance artfully blends fruity and floral notes to create a sophisticated scent that shows off your ability to brighten any room. Long-lasting with a moderate sillage, this fragrance ensures your presence makes a head-turning entrance no matter the room, without being overpowering. Leading off the scent are the tops notes of almond, black currant and artemisia. Floral heart notes include vanilla, magnolia, jasmine and osmanthus. Spicy base notes of white tobacco, papyrus, patchouli and juniper supporting the lighter upper layers.
About the brand:
Over the past 35 years, Amouage's fragrances have continued to reflect the wonderful heritage and mastery of perfume creation. Devoted to developing finely blended perfumes with only the highest quality ingredients, the brand adopts an inventive and highly creative approach to all its creations, continuously reinventing itself and sustaining a reputation of integrity and innovation.

The famous celebrity Paris Hilton has her own lines of shoes, handbags, watches, lashes, nails, sunglasses, clothing, and cosmetic collection. Name: Bvlgari Le Gemme Lilaia
Description:
This fragrance inspired by the treasured secret of Egypt’s Ancient that emblematic of life, prosperity and regeneration. This Lilaia fragrance adds fresh and rejuvenated feelings with the natural scent of Galbanum and Musk.
About the brand:
Bvlgari is an ancient Italian parfume house founded by Sotrios Voulgary in Italy in 1884 and has replaced the letter "U" with the letter "V" in the name of the company following the old Latin language which is the language of his native country Greece, and opened the first outlet for parfumes produced in 1905 in Via de Condotti Here he presented a collection of the most luxurious and elegant men and women parfumes, and soon became famous and opened sales outlets in the international markets in New York, Geneva and others around the world.
