Description:
A feminine fragrance with White Iris that adds harmony and romantic touch. This fragrance leaves comfort and protection feelings with its white, milky fragrance of Heliotrope flowers and Sandalwood.

Description:
This fragrance is taking you to a journey into the Iberian Peninsula with its sunny morning and a luminous stone. This elegant scent combines with citrus notes and sweet peach. A chypre fragrance mixes with Orange Flower and Patchouli that adds fortify and energy sense of the Mediterranean light.

Name: Boucheron Ambre D'Alexandrie
Description:
An aromatic oriental blend for men and women that mixes with tobacco, benzoin and amber. This fragrance combines with soft vanilla that makes the fragrance suitable for all occasions, evening parties and busy days
About the brand:
Boucheron is a large French family whose founder was Friedrich Boucheron in 1958, the family became famous for making precious and luxurious jewelry and opened the first boutique at Place Vendôme in Paris to offer that jewelry to the public and then invaded the world of parfumes for the first time in 1988 and the first parfume launched in this year is parfume The women's Bushoron, which soon spread to France and abroad

Name: Boucheron Neroli D'Ispahan
Description:

The firm has made a mark in the market for prestigious writing instruments for years, but has also expanded into a plethora of different product lines, from Swiss-made watches to eyewear and fragrances in an attempt to complete the luxurious lifestyle, all capped with the emblematic white peak design. The Mont Blanc has distinctive fragrances which are reminders of special moments, aimed at men and women who know how to distinguish themselves in a royal, elegant manner.

Description: Lalique Reve D'Inflni is a floral fragrance for women. A gorgeous, classic, fresh and long-lasting perfume with a unique bottle. It smells great and is addictive for spring. The scent of femininity and elegance, Reve D'Inflni flaunts with a soft pink box decorated with Ardente; the symbol of eternity. The fruity top notes start off with the Lychee note. Fresh notes of Bergamot added to rich notes of Freesia set off the spirit of the scent. The heart of the perfume is formed with a hint of Peach and a splash of satin Rose Absolute. The dry-down has a woodsy vibe and is slightly sweet thanks to the vanilla and musk.

The beautiful floral combination is supported on a base of creamy sandalwood, cedar and smooth, delicate musk. The bottle is extremely elegant and captivating. A gracefully refined beauty, Lalique L'Amour is a fragrance made for a sensual woman.

White amber and white musk the base unusually deep. The bottle is a gorgeous match of the stunning perfume. Guerlain La Petite Robe Noire Ma Robe Cocktail is a fresh and youthful fragrance. Description:
It is undeniable feminine, Blossom fragrance. Top notes of a fresh citrus cocktail and red berries, in the heart, the softness of a bouquet of silky peas and roses, and finally, an erotic white musk with creamy sandalwood. The bottle reflects the light through a precise dégradé polished in the shadow of pink. The diamond cap associates juvenility and sophistication. The outer packaging is highly apparent due to an intensive chinny pink color and gorgeous glitters.
About the brand:
Jimmy Choo learned the trade from his father, Known for his handcrafted shoes. Choo took to the occupation quickly and was making shoes by himself by age 11. While he was born in Penang, Malaysia, he traveled to England to study and eventually stayed to start a business in London. His first store opened in 1986 and was formerly the site of a hospital. His collections garnered critical acclaim, and he joined with Vogue magazine editor Tamara Mellon to start his personal fashion line in 1996.

Top notes of hibiscus flower and bergamot mix with sugary nectarine and floral peony at the heart of the fragrance. The fruity and floral notes are landed by the parfume base notes of sugared cedarwood and musk; embodying the sensational yet sweet inequality at the core of the Jimmy Choo woman.
About the brand:
Jimmy Choo learned the trade from his father, Known for his handcrafted shoes. Choo took to the occupation quickly and was making shoes by himself by age 11. His collections garnered critical acclaim, and he joined with Vogue magazine editor Tamara Mellon to start his personal fashion line in 1996.

His first boutique location opened in 1974, and his first collection launched in 1976. This women’s collection turned out to be an immediate success. The company's first incursion into parfumes began with legendary Fidji for women, in 1966. The first men's parfume from Guy LaRoche was 1972's Drakkar, which was eclipsed by its more successful flanker, Drakkar Noir, in 1982. his company still offers parfumes in cooperation with L'Oréal, as it the earliest edition was created in 1966 and the newest is from 2014.

Name: Dior Dolce Vita
Description:
Dolce Vita, a women’s fragrance released by Christian Dior in 1994, is a floral and woody perfume with just the right touch of sweet and spice. Crafted by Pierre Bourdon and Maurice Roger, this feminine scent produces the kind of luscious aroma that won’t be easily forgotten in your wake. Bursting with luscious fruits, the top notes of the scent contain soft lily, fleshy and juicy peach, tart grapefruit, citrusy bergamot, romantic rose, and sweet cardamom. Fuzzy apricot, lush magnolia, sensuous cinnamon, heliotrope, and woody palisander rosewood combine to form the heart of the fragrance. Milky sandalwood, tropical coconut, comforting vanilla and familiar cedar comprise the perfume’s base notes.
About the brand:
Founded in 1946 by designer Christian Dior, Dior is a pillar in the world of leather goods, fashion accessories, footwear, jewelry, timepieces, fragrance, makeup and skin care products, maintaining a long tradition as a creator of haute-couture fashion. In 1947, the group's first fragrance, Miss Dior, took the world by storm. Since that fateful day, Dior fragrances have truly made their mark thanks to their scope of influence and the use of the noblest of materials, boldly and passionately creating high-quality, unique and timeless fragrances.
Details: ['Dior', 'Women', 'Perfume', 'Romantic', 'Woody', '100 ml', '2014', 'Magnolia, Lily-of-the-valley, Rose,Apricot, Peach, Cinnamon,Heliotrope, Sandalwood, Vanilla', 'Eau de Toilette', 'Magnolia, Lily-of-the-valley, Rose', 'Apricot, Peach, Cinnamon', 'Heliotrope, Sandalwood, Vanilla']

Name: Cartier Le Baiser Du Dragon
Description:
Le Baiser du Dragon by Cartier, which refers to a Dragon's Kiss in French, is an exotic woody-aromatic fragrance that layers rich almond and musky florals over a subtly sensual base of vetiver and patchouli. The fragrance opens with a sumptuous, fiery almond and amaretto accord rounded out by citrus and floral tones of neroli and gardenia. Heady jasmine, iris and powdery-fresh red rose dominate the heart notes, flanked by cedar and white musk. Lightly bitter, woody vetiver and earthy-sweet patchouli combine with nuances of caramel, benzoin and dark chocolate to produce a deeply satisfying finish.
About the brand:
Cartier is a French luxury goods conglomerate that designs, manufactures, distributes and sells jewelry and watches. Founded by Louis-François Cartier in Paris in 1847, the company operates more than 200 stores in 125 countries and is regarded as one of the most prestigious luxury goods manufacturers in the world. Expanding into the world of fragrances, the luxury house found further success, creating perfumes and care products that continue to appeal to their international customer base.

Name: Gianfranco Ferré Ferré Rose
Description:
Ferre Rose is a silky and feminine fruity floral fragrance convenient for daily use. This youthful parfume has light all-fruit top notes of watermelon, pomegranate, mandarin orange, and peach. The middle of the parfume is rose along with some orange blossom, water hyacinth, Japanese gardenia and freesia. The base notes are smooth vanilla and amber with some cedar and sandalwood.
About the brand:
He is an Italian fashion designer also known as "the architect of fashion" for his background and his original attitude toward creating fashion design. Ferré began his fashion career in 1970 by designing accessories, then worked as a raincoat designer in 1972-74. He started his own company Baila in 1974, and launched his signature collection for women in 1978. it has a lot of product lines such as gianfranco Ferré Fragrances and gianfranco Ferré: Main line for men, women and children. It has also Ferré: Previously known as the White Label, more practical, ready-to-wear for both men, women. Ferre designed Korean Air's flight attendant uniforms in 2005, using Korean "binyeo" traditional hair accessories.

Name: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Yuzu
Description: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Yuzu is a nice summer fragrance for women. Soft, serene and bright, it encompasses a balanced mixture of light citrus notes and green tea. This luscious fragrance opens with the citrusy notes; lemon and bergamot combined. Green tea tones swim in the sweet scents of Yuzu. The heart is rich with green tea leaves, Yuzu pulp accord, wild thyme, black currant buds and Tunisian Neroli. The dry-down has a hint of musk, a shade of white birch and ambrette seed. Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Yuzu is a delicious scent that is perfect for spring.

Name: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Tropical
Description: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Tropical is an aromatic fruity fragrance for women. Tropical fruits and tea notes are perfectly balanced in this refreshing fragrance. The fragrance opens with a sweet combination of litchi and passion flower. The heart comprises soft florals such as magnolia that are encompassed in green tea notes. The dry-down is a wonderful blend of musk and a mixture of tropical fruits. Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Tropical is suitable for hot weather. Fresh, juicy and floral, this summer scent will take you on an exotic journey to the tropical forests.

Name: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Nectarine Blossom
Description: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Nectarine Blossom is a floral fruity fragrance for women. The fragrance opens with a lovely, calming green tea note. The freshness is enhanced with the aroma of peaches, while bergamot gives a sharp hint to the scent. The mid-phase starts off with sweet, juicy and ripe nectarine. The peachy shades linger along with the green tea notes. The dry-down is musky. Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Nectarine Blossom is a beautiful, clean and fresh scent that is perfect for sweltering summertime. It is light, bubbly and uplifting.

Name: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Lotus
Description: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Lotus is an amazing floral feminine perfume. The scent is clean, fresh and long-lasting. The fragrance opens with luscious plum, captivating cherry blossom and yuzu in the background. The fresh blend at the heart consists of sweet lotus, whiffs of green tea, a trail of osmanthus and a hint of lily. The dry-down is musky and feminine with white birch. Perfect for daytime wear, spring and summer seasons. Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Lotus is an energizing fragrance that mingles with the body in natural harmony and emits a divine scent.

Name: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Exotic
Description: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Exotic is a floral fruity fragrance for women. A beautiful, clean and fresh scent filled with a feminine notes. The fragrance opens with a sharp citrusy mix of bergamot and lime against a background of black tea. The heart sparkles with green tea. Tropical floral scents surface with a striking touch of orchid combined with lily tones and purple vine blossom scent. The base is pleasantly woody, ambery and floral. Elizabeth Arden Green Tea Exotic is a fresh and energetic fragrance that is perfect for summer days.

Name: Dior Miss Dior Originale
Description:
Miss Dior Originale contains top notes of gardenia, galbanum, bergamot and clary sage. It unfolds into a floral scent of jasmine, neroli, narcissus, lily of the valley, carnation and orris. It is not as akin to modern feminine scents as it is to the old robust perfumes from the mid-twentieth century. This heavy scent ends with warm, spicy notes of patchouli, oakmoss, cistus, sandalwood, amber, vetiver, labdanum, ambergris, and castoreum. This is the type of scent that people will take notice of and that will linger when you’re gone. It is sensual, heavy and robust.
About the brand:
Founded in 1946 by designer Christian Dior, Dior is a pillar in the world of leather goods, fashion accessories, footwear, jewelry, timepieces, fragrance, makeup and skin care products, maintaining a long tradition as a creator of haute-couture fashion. In 1947, the group's first fragrance, Miss Dior, took the world by storm. Since that fateful day, Dior fragrances have truly made their mark thanks to their scope of influence and the use of the noblest of materials, boldly and passionately creating high-quality, unique and timeless fragrances.

An intriguing fragrance that takes you away with its charm and touches your senses and soul in subtle and fun ways, with a mix of bergamot, Brazilian rose, and incense.
About the brand:
Clinique is based in the United States of America and is manufacturing wide range of skincare products, cosmetics, toiletries and fragrances. Clinique has managed to emerge as a leader in this arena.

This fruity fragrance with sweet and delicious notes of peach and apricot that adds fresh and feminine aroma to start tour evening with delightful and pleasant feelings.

Chopard is emblematic of a natural, positive and responsible parfumery, Chopard places nature, ethics and luxury naturals at the very heart of its fragrance universe. Name: Estée Lauder Youth-Dew
Description:
Estée Lauder's Youth-Dew is a spicy perfume for women and was introduced in 1953. Designed by Josephine Catapano, the perfume opens to the notes of orange, aldehydes, peach, spices, bergamot, lavender, and narcissus. The middle notes are cassia, cinnamon, jasmine, orchid, cloves, rose, ylang-ylang, lily-of-the-valley, and spices. The base notes are formed by Peru balsam, tolu balsam, patchouli, amber, vanilla, musk, incense, and vetiver. Youth-Dew is termed as one of the sexiest fragrances ever introduced by Estée Lauder.
About the brand:
Estée Lauder is a leading cosmetics brand known for its wide range of skincare and beauty products. Established by Estée Lauder in 1946, this brand largely known for its lipsticks and other skincare products is also regarded for its collection of colognes and luxury perfumes. The perfumes from this brand embody passion, which makes them popular among men and women of different ages.

Rose, honey, jasmine, and iris makes up for the floral heart of the perfume. Cedarwood and sandalwood add a bit of warmth to the fragrance. This perfume makes ideal everyday wear.

Description:
Cinnabar Perfume by Estée Lauder is a spicy fragrance for women. This perfume was launched in 1978 and is still popular among women of various age groups. The top notes are peach, fruity tangerine, bergamot, orange blossom, along with cloves and spices. The heart notes are carnation, lily, jasmine, rose, lily-of-the-valley, cinnamon, and ylang-ylang. The perfume then transitions to base notes of vanilla, incense, benzoin, soothing patchouli, amber, and sandalwood.

Description:
Azuree Perfume by Estée Lauder is a refreshing women's perfume that transports you to the realms of the Mediterranean Coast. Inspired by French Riviera, where Estée Lauder lived for some time, the fragrance packs various fresh floral scents in an eclectic combination that reminds you of the complex aroma of the Mediterranean island. The opening notes are basil, citrus, and jasmine. The middle notes are vetiver, armoise, and rose. The base notes are moss, amber, and patchouli.

Name: Estée Lauder Aliage
Description:
Aliage by Estée Lauder is the first sports fragrance for women and was introduced in 1972. This fragrance has top notes of citrus, peach, and fresh greens. The middle notes are caraway, jasmine, Brazilian rosewood, and pine tree. The base notes comprise myrrh, vetiver, musk, and oakmoss. This perfume celebrates femininity and rubs an energetic feeling on women wearing it.

Name: Estée Lauder SpellBound
Description:
Estée Lauder's Spellbound perfume is designed for women, and it was introduced in 1991. This perfume has a warm, spicy, and refined charm that is hard to ignore. The top notes are citrus, rose, and apricot. Daffodil, orange blossom, cardamom, and carnation forms the heart notes. The base notes feature vanilla, vetiver, and amber. This perfume is designed by Sophia Grojsman.

Estée Lauder is a leading cosmetics brand known for its wide range of skincare and beauty products. Description: Elizabeth Arden Provocative Woman is a beautiful floral fragrance. The scent is soft and feminine, seductive and bold. The opening is lush, fruity and floral with quince, fresh water lotus and spicy ginger lily. The heart contains infinite floral scents; intoxicating orchid, papaya blossom and airy pink freesia. Base notes are warm white sand notes, rich and smooth Hinoki wood and delightful red amber. This splendid sophisticated and unique scent is an excellent choice for year-round occasions. Feel irresistibly sexy as you flaunt your sensual charms with Elizabeth Arden Provocative Woman.

Description:
Rabie perfume with feminine notes, wonderful, fresh and lively, and smells of fresh flowers spread with dew, with a wonderful mixture of apples, narcissus, and musk.

Dolce & Gabbana was established in 1985 by two Italian fashion designers. Dolce & Gabbana has not only managed to build a loyal customer base in such a short span of time but it also partnered with Motorola and Sony Ericson for multiple campaigns. D&G has also partnered with football clubs namely AC Milan and Chelsea FC.

Name: Dior Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming
Description:
Miss Dior Absolutely Blooming is the fruity floral fragrance for the woman who loves life and embraces it wholeheartedly. Wear this fragrance during the day, and throughout the year, when you want to add a refreshing boost to your step. A heavy sillage ensures this long-lasting fragrance fills the room when you enter and remains behind as a tantalizing reminder of your presence when you make your exit. The top notes of this delicious perfume pyramid include pink pepper, black currant, pomegranate, and raspberry. The floral middle notes are peony and May rose. The aromatic base note is white musk.
About the brand:
Founded in 1946 by designer Christian Dior, Dior is a pillar in the world of leather goods, fashion accessories, footwear, jewelry, timepieces, fragrance, makeup and skin care products, maintaining a long tradition as a creator of haute-couture fashion. In 1947, the group's first fragrance, Miss Dior, took the world by storm. Since that fateful day, Dior fragrances have truly made their mark thanks to their scope of influence and the use of the noblest of materials, boldly and passionately creating high-quality, unique and timeless fragrances.

This mysterious fragrance with the unique and unusual scent of amber that adds harmonic and radiance. This fragrance has an elegant note of hibiscus and jasmine that leaves the warmth and energetic aroma.

The Italian fashion house Costume National was founded in 1986, blasting the runways with a newly found harmony between classicism and modernism, boldness and sensuality… think of a classic glamour queen with a mohawk. Founder Ennio Capasa has expanded his empire with the addition of a parfumery, seeking to represent his tastes for edgy elegance in his fragrances.

A feminine and delicate fragrance characterized by floral notes that give you a feeling of comfort and tranquility, enjoying the softness and warmth that keeps you attractive and elegant throughout the day.
About the brand:
Calvin Klein was launched in 1968, founded Calvin Richard Klein. It initially started with a clothing line and eventually moved to introduce fragrances, watches and jewelry. Description:
A luxury fragrance with musk that combines with jasmine,orange flowers and delicious berries. This fragrance comes with an elegant aromatic bottle that adds beauty and elegant touch from the first moment.
About the brand:
Bvlgari is an ancient Italian parfume house founded by Sotrios Voulgary in Italy in 1884 and has replaced the letter "U" with the letter "V" in the name of the company following the old Latin language which is the language of his native country Greece, and opened the first outlet for parfumes produced in 1905 in Via de Condotti Here he presented a collection of the most luxurious and elegant men and women parfumes, and soon became famous and opened sales outlets in the international markets in New York, Geneva and others around the world.

Name: Bvlgari Omnia Paraiba
Description:
This fragrance inspired by Brazilian jungle, beaches and ocean that gives natural and relaxing touch. This fruity fragrance of bitter orange and Maracuja that combines with vetiver and cocoa. This scent takes you to the heart of Brazilian gardenia to enjoy a fresh and beautiful view.

Name: Giorgio Beverly Hills Gior Gio
Description:
Giorgio Beverly Hills Gyor Gio Eau de Toilette is an appealing floral scent that has the spirit of femininity and softness. The fragrance is suitable for daily use. It gives you a sense of delicacy and spiritual beauty.
About the brand:
Giorgio Beverly Hills, established in 1961, was the first luxury boutique to be founded on Rodeo Drive in Beverly Hills, California, United States.It was founded by Fred Hayman and George Grant. Giorgio Beverly Hills was one of the first scents to be marketed via the new technology of scent strips.

Name: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea
Description: Elizabeth Arden Green Tea is a rejuvenating fragrance that stems from fresh natural ingredients. It is energetic, uplifting and inspiring for the body and the spirit. The opening of the fragrance is a striking blend of bergamot, caraway, rhubarb, fresh lemon and orange zest. The heart beats to the scent of green tea and cool minty peppermint. A hint of jasmine gives a more delicate air. Spicy carnation, fresh fennel and crisp celery spice all complement the scent. The dry-down is a distinct blend of amber, oakmoss and musk. Feel fresh and invigorated with Green Tea.

Name: Aigner Too Feminine
Description:
Aigner Too Feminine perfume is a floral fruity fragrance for women. It's a combination of refreshing, cool, and, sweet aromas that perfectly suit the exciting summer season. The fragrance opens up with a fruit fiesta of juicy watermelon, tangy grapefruit, and sweet passionfruit. The heart is a bouquet of aromas with middle notes of jasmine, orange blossom, tuberose, violet, and magnolia. Setting it all on a sweet base of oakmoss, iris, vetiver, musk, amber, and sandalwood. Aigner Too Feminine is complemented with a girly pink and silver bottle, giving it a more flamboyant character to catch the eyes.
About the brand:
Known to enhance the pleasures in life and reflect a certain savoir vivre and sheer style, Aigner has become an integral part of its customers' journey. Originally a designer of leather goods and handbag classics, the brand has since expanded to become a fully-fledged luxury lifestyle provider that bridges the gap between tradition and innovation.

The fragrance opens up with a burst of bergamot and the unique scent of rice flower swaying in the airy and dewy green notes. The heart is rich with fresh lotus, spicy ginger and a wonderful mix of lily and orchid. The dry-down is subtle and sexy with creamy sandalwood, a touch of amber and spicy musk. Arden Beauty is an intriguing scent that is perfect for work and official settings.

Montale was established in 2003 by Pierre Montale in Paris. Montale creates fragrance from natural ingredients, which makes the fragrance long-lasting. The liquid comes in a special aluminum bottle to protect the fragrance from light. Montale has a variety of fragrances for both men and women.

Description:
Estée Lauder's Modern Muse Nuit is an intoxicating women's perfume that packs glamour, mystery, and sensuality. The fragrance opens with the notes of sweet mandarin orange and cassis leaf, which lends a zesty flavor to it. The heart notes comprising chamomile, heliotrope, Chinese jasmine, and night-blooming jasmine lends opulence. The base notes of musk, tonka bean, amber, Madagascar vanilla, patchouli, and Indian sandalwood makes the perfume absolutely stunning.
About the brand:
Estée Lauder is a leading cosmetics brand known for its wide range of skincare and beauty products. Established by Estée Lauder in 1946, this brand largely known for its lipsticks and other skincare products is also regarded for its collection of colognes and luxury perfumes. The perfumes from this brand embody passion, which makes them popular among men and women of different ages.

Description:
This luxurious oriental floral fragrance features a feminine note that fits all seasons. The title of the elegant woman is a fragrance that embodies its charm and elegance, and this fragrance helps you embody this easily. It conceives the scent of life in full romance. The resulting fragrance exudes the aura of a summertime flirt; it evokes the feeling of being in love. A multifaceted scent tribute to an amazing blend of Red Tea, Blood Orange, and a mixture of citrus ingredients, the scent migrates into a woody base made of enticing vetiver, the finest cedar wood, and the purest patchouli.
About the brand:
Carolina Herrera is a Venezuelan-born American fashion designer, known for her elegance and sophistication. Before she became a designer, she was known as one of the most beautifully dressed women in the world. Her company is renowned for its sophisticated and elegant classic designs, as well as its fragrances.

The peppery note abates as rich and warm notes of rose and plum liquor take over adding a divine vibe. The dry-down is marked by sandalwood and leather. The blend of spicy, woodsy, and leathery notes gives the scent a luxurious aura. Valentino Donna Noir Absolu is a trendy and modern scent with classical air. Designed for a sophisticated cool woman, this fragrance is ideal for wintertime and special occasions.

Description:

The creator of this fragrance is Pierre Montale. the notes of the fragrance are Cambodian oud, Indonesian patchouli leaf, rose petals, mandarin orange, and musk. The main accords of the fragrance are citrus, rose, patchouli, musky, and warm spicy.
About the brand:
Montale was established in 2003 by Pierre Montale in Paris. Montale creates fragrance from natural ingredients, which makes the fragrance long-lasting. The liquid comes in a special aluminum bottle to protect the fragrance from light. Montale has a variety of fragrances for both men and women.

The top notes of the fragrance are orange blossom, cardamom, and saffron, heart notes are rose, musk and leather, base notes are vanilla, patchouli, and oud. The main accords of the perfume are warm spicy, leather, rose, patchouli, vanilla and oud.

The foundation stone of the Salvatore Ferragamo S.P.A. company was laid in the year 1927. Ferragamo Group is the subsidiary of this company. The Ferragamo Group is referred to as a leading player in the luxury goods industry. Marc Jacobs is a famous fashion brand which has made its way to the top and was founded by Marc Jacobs who was on Time magazine's "2010 Time 100" list of the 100 most influential people in the world. With its top trending masculine and feminine products, it has gone famous all around the world.

Name: La Perla La Mia Perla
Description: La Mia Perla first burst onto the scene in 2017. This feminine fragrance uniquely presents an array of scent notes of equal standing—making for a dynamic, sensual experience. These notes include mild white pepper and citrusy mandarin oranges. Sweet peony flowers and pungent jasmine sambac also rest at the blend’s center. Powerful ambroxide, sultry leather and subtle wisps of iris work to balance the composition and round off the warm, syrupy components. Musk fragrance enhancers and sandalwood mix in to intensify this simply irresistible blend.

Description:
A wonderful fragrance from the woody and fruity family of discerning women. It is considered one of the most beautiful, luxurious, elegant and practical woody fragrances for women. The fragrance is designed with a feminine and soft texture that brings you in a unique bottle to carry you notes of the highest beauty!
About the brand:
Founded in 1925 by Hugo Boss for clothing launching purpose, Hugo Boss is a German luxury fashion house. As of 2016, Hugo Boss has 1,100 retail stores worldwide. Hugo Boss has emerged as probably one of the most famous brands in the manufacturing and selling of fashion products. With a strong emphasis on both masculine and feminine products, you simply cannot help but fall in love with their perfumes.

This feminine scent opens with fruity notes of mandarin orange, pear, and heady rum. Slowly you will realize it blending with floral notes of gardenia, tuberose, orchid, and jasmine. However, the base notes of musk, amber, and a variety of woody notes stir a classy dash of elegance into it.
About the brand:
Agent Provocateur is a luxury lingerie brand from the UK, which was founded in 1994. The brand introduced its first perfume in 2000. Their perfumes are adored for their complex combinations.

Abercrombie & Fitch today is based in Ohio and currently has more than 300 stores in the United States, in addition to flagship stores in Canada, Europe, Puerto Rico, and Asia. The earliest edition was created in 1997 and the newest is from 2020.

Description:
Korloff Lady Korloff Intense by Korloff Paris is an oriental floral woody musk scent for women. It was launched in the year 2017. Its top notes are orange, mandarin orange and pear; its middle notes are jasmine, orange blossom, and tuberose; base notes are musk, cedar, and sandalwood.
About the brand:
The brand Korloff Paris was found in 1978 by Daniel Paillasseur, who named it after a luxurious and legendary diamond. His unique and innovative creations earned him reputation and international recognition even before Korloff was found. The first fragrance in the house was simply named Korloff, a floral.

Tommy Hilfiger is one of the leading brands in the world of fashion and lifestyle, and is internationally recognized for celebrating the essence of exquisite classic American style

Name: Cartier La Panthere Edition Soir
Description:
Cartier La Panthere Edition Soir by Cartier is a women’s chypre floral perfume that’s made for fall and winter nights. Launched in 2016, this fragrance was signed by Mathilde Laurent, Cartier’s in-house perfumer, and is best described as a blend of floral and animal notes, along with oakmoss, musk, and gardenia. It has white floral, floral, woody, earthy, and musky main accords. The fragrance is announced as a dose of femininity and glamour of a wild and independent woman. The glass bottle is thick and square, has a panther’s face, and is topped with a stylish black cap.
About the brand:
Cartier is a French luxury goods conglomerate that designs, manufactures, distributes and sells jewelry and watches. Founded by Louis-François Cartier in Paris in 1847, the company operates more than 200 stores in 125 countries and is regarded as one of the most prestigious luxury goods manufacturers in the world. Expanding into the world of fragrances, the luxury house found further success, creating perfumes and care products that continue to appeal to their international customer base.

This powerful fragrance inspired by the Japanese art that has presence precisely which makes you feel unique and preference reflecting on your personality.
About the brand:
Comme des Garçons was founded in 1969 by the designer Rei Kawakubo, Comme des Garçons is marked by an avant-garde universe and an artistic approach to fashion. The Comme des Garçons parfume collection was launched in 1994 with the parfumer Mark Buxton, who created the first fragrances; each fragrance is unisex and discrete, often marked by rare woody and spicy notes. The first fragrance, CDG Eau de Parfum, has marked the history of parfumery with its floral chypré notes.

Montale was established in 2003 by Pierre Montale in Paris. Montale creates fragrance from natural ingredients, which makes the fragrance long-lasting. The liquid comes in a special aluminum bottle to protect the fragrance from light. Montale has a variety of fragrances for both men and women.

Name: Calvin Klein Obsessed For Women
Description:
Here is a breathtaking fragrance with luxurious oriental accents for classic women who always draw attention with their elegance and beauty, an ideal perfume for all seasons that refreshes your senses and makes you feel all day long. 
About the brand:
   Calvin Klein was launched in 1968, founded Calvin Richard Klein. It initially started with a clothing line and eventually moved to introduce fragrances, watches and jewelry. Enjoy a guaranteed sense of class uplifting when you let others around you smell the scent of Calvin Klein masculine and feminine fragrances.

Description:
A weekly holiday with floral notes mixed with delicious fruit scents, madam, with this most famous fragrance among the luxurious fragrances that carries more touches of love and warmth, produced by the Burberry Company in order to capture your heart and refresh your soul, in addition to drawing attention to everyone around you.
About the brand:
Founded in 1856, Burberry is a trusted luxury design house, world famous for its accessories, tartan patterns, and sturdy trench coats . Their famous motifs are often copied and imitated across the globe; however, none can match the quality of this staple of British fashion. Their fragrances match many qualities of their apparel: classic, long-lasting, and elegant.

Name: Estée Lauder Modern Muse Le Rouge
Description:
Modern Muse Le Rouge Perfume by Estée Lauder is a perfume for women and it was introduced in 2015. This mesmerizing perfume combines various floral, spicy, and aromatic notes to provide you delectable scent, that's sure to make you blush. The top notes are red currant seeds, red raspberry, saffron, and spicy pink pepper. The heart notes are lush May rose, night-blooming jasmine, elegant Bulgarian Rose, and chic magnolia petals. The base notes are Madagascar Vanilla, ambrette, vetiver, and patchouli. This perfume evokes a compelling scent, which is difficult to ignore.
About the brand:
Estée Lauder is a leading cosmetics brand known for its wide range of skincare and beauty products. Established by Estée Lauder in 1946, this brand largely known for its lipsticks and other skincare products is also regarded for its collection of colognes and luxury perfumes. The perfumes from this brand embody passion, which makes them popular among men and women of different ages.

Name: Estée Lauder Modern Muse Chic
Description:
Modern Music Chick by Estée Lauder is a floral fragrance for women. Launched in 2014, this perfume combines green, woody accords and flora for an elegant appeal. The top notes are dark plum and fresh Artemesia; the heart notes are lily, jasmine sambac, and tuberose; and the base notes are agarwood (oud), cashmere wood, labdanum, patchouli, musk, ebony tree, suede, and Madagascar vanilla.
About the brand:
Estée Lauder is a leading cosmetics brand known for its wide range of skincare and beauty products. Established by Estée Lauder in 1946, this brand largely known for its lipsticks and other skincare products is also regarded for its collection of colognes and luxury perfumes. The perfumes from this brand embody passion, which makes them popular among men and women of different ages.

Name: Mon amour Set
Description:
This set contains:
- Versace Eros Pour Femme EDP - 100 ml
A woody floral fragrance, embodying love and beauty for the Greeks, that lasts long and is made of a blend of high-quality notes of peony, sensual wood, musk, and jasmine.
- Versace Eros Pour Homme - 100 ml
For the strong man who is the master of himself, this oriental woody fragrance is dedicated to you. The composition has notes of mint in the top, geranium in the middle, and vanilla in the base, providing you with an irresistible scent that boosts your charismatic character at your special events.
About the brand:
Versace is a global, well-known brand that was created in Italy. Its first release of perfumes was in 1981. Since then, it has gained its distinctive place in the world of perfumes. Its perfumes offer joy, happiness, and elegance to all its lovers.
Details: ['Eau de Parfum', 'Versace', 'Unisex', 'Perfume Set']

Name: Ti amo Set
Description:
This set contains:
- Givenchy Eau De Moiselle - 100 ml
Create a vintage vibe around your outfit by wearing Eau Demoiselle perfume from Givenchy. This fragrance is wholly on its own. It is not quite modern but not quite traditional. It exists on its own terms with a composition that consists of notes of Italian winter lemon, tangerine, ylang-ylang, rose, Japanese basil, tonka, ambrette seed, and musk. Eau Demoiselle offers the sensation of walking through a garden on a dewy morning. Its composition was developed by the expert perfumer, Francois Demachy. This perfume is available in a gorgeous, cylindrical flacon.
- Givenchy Xeryus Rouge - 100 ml
Xeryus the first oriental perfume for men by Givenchy, is a sensual and seductive fragrance created to impress. This intriguing fragrance presents an ideal balance of sweet amber, delicate carnation, attractive cypress, spicy sandalwood, aromatic juniper berries, earthy floral geranium, creamy leather and manly musk. The classy and masculine scent is befitting of your perfect summer night. Sweetness mixed with spiciness makes the perfume irresistible. The freshness and spiciness combination makes the fragrance both classy and chic. The epitome of charm; Xeryus is a masculine fragrance made for you. Make your presence known.
About the brand:
Founded in 1952, Givenchy is a beloved French luxury fashion house and perfume maker that continues to leave an indelible mark on the fashion industry. Today, the brand is celebrated worldwide for its avant-garde and timeless haute couture clothing, accessories, perfumes and cosmetics.
Details: ['Eau de Toilette', 'Givenchy', 'Unisex', 'Bundles']

Name: One and Only Set
Description:
This set contains:
- Giorgio Armani Acqua Di Gio Homme - 100 ml
This aquatic, aromatic fragrance opens with a splash of fresh, calabrian bergamot, neroli and green tangerine. Light, aquatic nuances mix with jasmine petal, crisp rock rose, rosemary, fruity persimmon and warm Indonesian patchouli to create a masculine scent that is both fresh and sensual.Â Mood: Natural and authentic. Woody marine freshness. Women's Health "Best Men's Fragrance" 2010 Award Winner.

Embodies a feminine ‘glow’ that is perfect for spring and summer. Dressed in delicate nude pink, the fragrance bottle will look classy and elegant on your dressing table. Make it your everyday scent.
About the brand:
Giorgio Armani translates his sense of fashion and his aesthetic vision into the world of fragrances, make-up and skincare. Elegance is key: beauty, simplicity and quality are delivered through products made from the finest materials, designed to convey an understated and timeless sophistication.

About the brand:

About the brand:
Dolce & Gabbana is an Italian luxury fashion house founded in 1985 in Legnano by Italian designers Domenico Dolce and Stefano Gabbana. The two met in Milan in 1980 and created designs for the same fashion house. In 1982, they established a designer consulting studio; in time, it grew to become "Dolce & Gabbana". They presented their first women's collection in 1985 in Milan, where a year later their store opened its doors.

Name: Moschino Cheap And Chic
Description: Enhance any ensemble with something that’s Cheap & Chic, a charming women’s fragrance. This warm, feminine elixir combines floral, citrus and woody accords for a delectable fresh aroma you’ll be pleased to wear from day till night. Top notes of yuzu, petitgrain, bergamot and Brazilian rosewood start the perfume with a light and refreshing atmosphere that abruptly awakens the senses. Heart notes of violet, water lily, pink peony, jasmine, cyclamen and soft rose infuse the scent with a decadent floral array that’s indulgent and refined. Finally, base notes of bright orchid, ambergris, iris, sandalwood, vetiver, tonka bean, vanilla, and musk complete the fragrance for a satisfying and alluring combination that’s a great addition to your beauty regimen.

Reb’l Fleur was followed by Rebelle, Nude, and Rogue, as well as, the flanker Rogue Love. Description: S. T. Dupont Royal Amber is an oriental perfume for men and women that takes you on a magical carpet ride to the exotic realms of the east. Name: Penhaligon's Zizonia
Description:
Penhaligon's Zizonia is an anthology of the famous Zizonia perfume by Penhaligon's that was first introduced in the 1930s. This oriental perfume has a nomadic and mysterious aura to it. The odyssey to the world of scents will lead you through the top notes of bergamot, orange blossom, and coriander; heart notes of lavender, cardamom, nutmeg, geranium, ginger, cumin, and black pepper before trailing off with the base notes of amber, patchouli, cedar, sandalwood, and vetiver. This perfume is available as 100 ml EDT.
About the brand:
Penhaligon's is the British perfume brand, which was found by William Henry Penhaligon in 1870. The brand is perhaps one of the few in the world that maintains its commitment to traditional ingredients and techniques in creative combinations. Made in the UK, the perfume brand offers a wide selection of fragrance for both women and men who wish to smell good at all times. Most perfume bottles feature a clear glass decorated with a ribbon, which was the original design envisaged by William Penhaligon.

About the brand:
Avon brand began as The California Perfume Company in 1886, when the Union Publishing House changed both its name and the focus of its business from publishing to perfumes and cosmetics. It was a pioneer in creating career opportunities for women at a time when most women did not work outside the home or were limited to clerical and domestic work. The first products to bear an Avon brand name were launched in 1928. The California Perfume Company filed for its first "Avon" trademark on a beauty product in 1932, and officially changed its name to Avon in 1939. It has produced over 900 perfumes. The earliest edition was created in 1934 and the newest is from 2020.

The bottle has been variegated like opal with many architectonic facets, making it a signature of art. The square silver cap adds a contemporary touch to the bottle.
About the brand:
Jimmy Choo learned the trade from his father, Known for his handcrafted shoes. Choo took to the occupation quickly and was making shoes by himself by age 11. While he was born in Penang, Malaysia, he traveled to England to study and eventually stayed to start a business in London. His first store opened in 1986 and was formerly the site of a hospital. His collections garnered critical acclaim, and he joined with Vogue magazine editor Tamara Mellon to start his personal fashion line in 1996.

Name: Guerlain Shallimar
Description: Guerlain Shalimar, the fragrance that was inspired by one of the greatest love stories of all time, the love story that gave the world one of its seven wonders; Taj Mahal. The Oriental fragrance embodies the qualities of its inspiration; intense love, sensuality, mystery and eternity. It also introduces the new revolution in the world of perfumes, ethylvanillin, blended with the Jicky accord. Shalimar takes flight with the freshness of flowers and bergamot. Jimmy Choo learned the trade from his father who was known for his handcrafted shoes. Choo took to the occupation quickly and was making shoes by himself by age 11. About the brand:

Name: Prada La Femme Intense
Description:
Prada La Femme Intense is a new classic Prada scent. The notes include frangipani flower, enriched with spices, beeswax and tuberose. The Prada woman is not one, she is many. La Femme Prada Intense reveals her multiplicity through a fragrance that experiments with gender, tradition and identity. It is an Eau de Parfum with a sultry, almost oriental quality, which exudes a heady sensuality. The intensity of the fragrance is achieved by magnifying the Tuberose, Ylang-Ylang and Patchouli at the heart of its composition.
About the brand:
The company started in 1913 by Mario Prada and his brother Martino as a leather goods shop "Fratelli Prada" in Milan, Italy. After years from establishing it Miuccia Prada took over the company in 1978, and then started making Backpacks, perfumes and achieved extensive fame in Europe.

About the brand:
Avon brand began as The California Perfume Company in 1886, when the Union Publishing House changed both its name and the focus of its business from publishing to perfumes and cosmetics. It was a pioneer in creating career opportunities for women at a time when most women did not work outside the home or were limited to clerical and domestic work. The first products to bear an Avon brand name were launched in 1928. The California Perfume Company filed for its first "Avon" trademark on a beauty product in 1932, and officially changed its name to Avon in 1939. It has produced over 900 perfumes. The earliest edition was created in 1934 and the newest is from 2020.

About the brand:
Bvlgari is an ancient Italian perfume house founded by Sotrios Voulgary in Italy in 1884. The letter "U" was replaced with the letter "V" in the name of the company following the old Latin language which is the language of his native country Greece. He opened the first outlet for perfumes produced in 1905 in Via de Condotti where he presented a collection of the most luxurious and elegant men and women perfumes. He soon became famous and opened sales outlets in the international markets in New York, Geneva and others around the world.

About the brand:
Tiziana Terenzi is a family-owned Italian niche brand of fragrances, primarily scented candles and then perfumes. It was established as Cereria Terenzi in 1968 in Cattolica and specialized first in candles. Evelino Terenzi’s sons, Tiziana and Paolo, are now the owners of the brand. Tiziana Terenzi is the designer, while Paolo Terenzi is the nose and the president of the company. It has produced more than 73 perfumes. The earliest edition was created in 2012 and the newest in 2020.
